name: Abathur
title: Evolution Master
description: A unique Hero that can manipulate the battle from anywhere on the map.

Abathur.name: Symbiote
Abathur.description:
Assist another allied Unit or Combat Structure, allowing you to shield them and use new Abilities.
Cannot be used on another Hero's Summons.

Abathur.name: Toxic Nest
Abathur.description: Spawn a mine that becomes active after a short time. Deals 153 (+4% per level) damage and reveals the enemy for 4 seconds. Lasts 90 seconds. Stores up to 3 charges

Abathur.name: Evolve Monstrosity
Abathur.description:
Turn an allied Minion or Locust into a Monstrosity. When enemy Minions near the Monstrosity die, it gains 5% Health and 5% Basic Attack damage, stacking up to 40 times.  The Monstrosity takes 50% less damage from non-Heroic enemies.
Using Symbiote on the Monstrosity allows you to control it, in addition to Symbiote's normal benefits.  This Ability can be reactivated to automatically cast Symbiote on your Monstrosity.

Abathur.name: Ultimate Evolution
Abathur.description: Clone target allied Hero and control it for 20 seconds. Abathur has perfected the clone, granting it 20% Ability Power, 20% bonus Attack Damage, and 10% bonus Movement Speed. Cannot use their Heroic Ability.

Abathur.name: Locust Strain
Abathur.description: Spawns a Locust to attack down the nearest lane every 15 seconds. Locusts last for 25 seconds.

Abathur.name: Deep Tunnel
Abathur.description: Quickly tunnel to a visible location

AbathurSymbiote.name: Stab
AbathurSymbiote.description: Shoots a spike towards target area that deals 113 (+0.04 per level) damage to the first enemy it contacts.

AbathurSymbiote.name: Spike Burst
AbathurSymbiote.description: Deals 111 (+0.04 per level) damage to nearby enemies.

AbathurSymbiote.name: Carapace
AbathurSymbiote.description: Shields the assisted ally for 150 (+0.04 per level). Lasts for 8 seconds.

1.name: Pressurized Glands
1.description: Increases the range of Symbiote's Spike Burst by 25% and decreases the cooldown by 1 second.

1.name: Survival Instincts
1.description: Increases Locust's Health by 50% and duration by 40%.

1.name: Regenerative Microbes
1.description: Symbiote's Carapace heals the target for 68 (+0.04 per level) Health per second.

1.name: Envenomed Nest
1.description: Toxic Nests deal 75% (+0.0588% per level) more damage over 3 seconds.

4.name: Prolific Dispersal
4.description: Reduces the cooldown of Toxic Nest by 2 seconds and adds 2 additional charges.

4.name: Ballistospores
4.description: Increases Toxic Nest's range to global and increases duration by 25%.

4.name: Sustained Carapace
4.description: Increases the Shield amount of Symbiote's Carapace by 40% and allows it to persist after Symbiote ends.

4.name: Adrenal Overload
4.description: Symbiote host gains 25% increased Attack Speed.

7.name: Needlespine
7.description: Increases the damage and range of Symbiote's Stab by 20%.

7.name: Vile Nest
7.description: Toxic Nests slow enemy Movement Speed by 40% for 2.5 seconds.

7.name: Networked Carapace
7.description: Using Symbiote's Carapace also applies an untalented Carapace Shield to all nearby allied Heroes, Minions, and Mercenaries.

7.name: Calldown: MULE
7.description: Activate to calldown a Mule that repairs Structures, one at a time, near target point for 40 seconds, healing for 100 Health every 1 second.  Grants 1 ammo every  3 seconds.

10.name: Ultimate Evolution
10.description: Clone target allied Hero and control it for 20 seconds. Abathur has perfected the clone, granting it 20% Ability Power, 20% bonus Attack Damage, and 10% bonus Movement Speed. Cannot use their Heroic Ability.

10.name: Evolve Monstrosity
10.description:
Turn an allied Minion or Locust into a Monstrosity. When enemy Minions near the Monstrosity die, it gains 5% Health and 5% Basic Attack damage, stacking up to 40 times.  The Monstrosity takes 50% less damage from non-Heroic enemies.
Using Symbiote on the Monstrosity allows you to control it, in addition to Symbiote's normal benefits.  This Ability can be reactivated to automatically cast Symbiote on your Monstrosity.

13.name: Assault Strain
13.description: Locust Basic Attacks cleave for 50% (+0.0588% per level) damage, and explode on death for 102 (+0.04 per level) damage.

13.name: Bombard Strain
13.description: Locust's Basic Attacks become a long-range siege attack that deal 70% (-0.0823% per level) more damage.

13.name: Spatial Efficiency
13.description: Symbiote's Stab gains 1 additional charge and its Cooldown is reduced by 0.5 seconds.

13.name: Soma Transference
13.description: Symbiote's Spike Burst heals the host for 64 (+0.04 per level) Health per enemy Hero hit.

16.name: Envenomed Spikes
16.description: Your Symbiote's Spike Burst also slows enemy Movement Speed by 40% for 2 seconds.

16.name: Adrenaline Boost
16.description: Symbiote's Carapace increases the Movement Speed of the target by 40% for 3.5 seconds.

16.name: Locust Brood
16.description: Activate to spawn 3 Locusts at a nearby location.

16.name: Volatile Mutation
16.description: Ultimate Evolution clones and Monstrosities deal 137 (+0.04 per level) damage to nearby enemies every 3 seconds and when they die.

20.name: Evolutionary Link
20.description: As long as the Ultimate Evolution is alive, the original target of the clone gains a Shield equal to 25% of their maximum Health.  Refreshes every 5 seconds.

20.name: Evolution Complete
20.description: Monstrosity gains the ability to Deep Tunnel to any visible location once every 25 seconds.

20.name: Hivemind
20.description: Symbiote creates an additional Symbiote on a nearby allied Hero.  This Symbiote mimics the commands of the first, but does half damage and shielding.

20.name: Locust Nest
20.description: Activate to create a nest that periodically spawns Locusts. Only one Locust Nest can be active at a time.

name: Alarak
title: Highlord of the Tal'darim
description: A combo Assasin that can move enemies around and punish mistakes.

Alarak.name: Discord Strike
Alarak.description: After a 0.5 second delay, enemies in front of Alarak take 175 damage and are silenced for 1.5 seconds.

Alarak.name: Telekinesis
Alarak.description: Create a force, pushing Alarak and all enemies hit from the targeted point towards the targeted direction. Deals 48 damage to enemies.

Alarak.name: Lighting Surge
Alarak.description: Deal 100 damage to an enemy and all enemies between Alarak and his victim. 75% of the damage dealt to enemy Heroes is returned as health.

Alarak.name: Counter-Strike
Alarak.description: Alarak targets an area and channels for 1 second, becoming Protected and Unstoppable. After, if he took damage from an enemy Hero, he sends a shockwave that deals 275 damage.

Alarak.name: Deadly Charge
Alarak.description:
After channeling, Alarak charges forward dealing 200 damage to all enemies in his path. Distance is increased based on the amount of time channeled, up to 1.6 seconds.

Issuing a Move order while this is channeling will cancel it at no cost. Taking damage will interrupt the channeling.

Alarak.name: Sadism
Alarak.description: Alarak deals 100% more Ability damage versus enemy Heroes.

name: Anub'arak
title: Traitor King
description: A Tank who specializes agaist Mages thanks in part to his innate Spell Armor.

Anubarak.name: Impale
Anubarak.description: Deals 100 (+0.04 per level) damage. Stuns for 1 second.

Anubarak.name: Harden Carapace
Anubarak.description: Gain a Shield that absorbs 300.3 (+0.04 per level) damage over 3 seconds.

Anubarak.name: Burrow Charge
Anubarak.description: Burrows to location, dealing 107 (+0.04 per level) damage and briefly stunning enemies in a small area upon surfacing. Can reactivate the Ability to surface early.

Anubarak.name: Locust Swarm
Anubarak.description: Deal 66 (+0.04 per level) damage per second in an area around yourself. Each enemy damaged heals you for 18 (+0.04 per level) Health. Lasts 8 seconds.

Anubarak.name: Cocoon
Anubarak.description: Wraps target enemy Hero in a cocoon, rendering them unable to act or be targeted for 8 seconds. Allies of the Hero can attack the cocoon to break it and free them early.

Anubarak.name: Scarab Host
Anubarak.description: Spawn a Beetle at your location whenever you use an Ability. Beetles last for 8 seconds, attacking nearby enemies for 20 (+0.04 per level) damage.

1.name: Extended Spikes
1.description: Increases Impale's range and damage by 25%.

1.name: Dampen Magic
1.description: Upon taking Ability Damage, reduce that damage and further Ability Damage by 50% for 1.5 seconds.  Can only trigger once every 8 seconds.

1.name: Assault Scarab
1.description: Increases the attack damage of spawned Beetles by 30%.

1.name: Regeneration Master
1.description: Quest: Gathering a Regeneration Globe increases your Health Regeneration by 1 per second, up to 30. Reward: After gathering 30 Regeneration Globes, you also gain 500 Health.

4.name: Underking
4.description: Increases Burrow Charge range by 20% and damage by 100%.

4.name: Locust Needles
4.description: Basic Attacks deal 60% of your Basic Attack Damage in an area around the target.

4.name: Legion of Beetles
4.description: Automatically spawn a Beetle every 8 seconds.  Can be toggled on and off.

7.name: Shed Exoskeleton
7.description: Gain 30% increased Move Speed for 3 seconds.

7.name: Chitinous Plating
7.description: While Harden Carapace is active, taking damage from enemy Abilities reduces its cooldown by 0.75 seconds, up to 3 seconds.

7.name: Leeching Scarabs
7.description: Beetles heal you for 50% of their damage with each attack if you are nearby.

10.name: Locust Swarm
10.description: Deal 66 (+0.04 per level) damage per second in an area around yourself. Each enemy damaged heals you for 18 (+0.04 per level) Health. Lasts 8 seconds.

10.name: Cocoon
10.description: Wraps target enemy Hero in a cocoon, rendering them unable to act or be targeted for 8 seconds. Allies of the Hero can attack the cocoon to break it and free them early.

13.name: Burning Rage
13.description: Deal 23 (+0.04 per level) damage per second to nearby enemies.

13.name: Urticating Spines
13.description: Casting Harden Carapace will also deal 80 (+0.04 per level) damage to nearby enemies. Deals double damage against Heroes.

13.name: Bed of Barbs
13.description: Create a bed of spikes along Impale's path that slows enemies by 30% and deals 46 (+0.04 per level) damage per second.  Spikes persist for 3.5 seconds.

16.name: Epicenter
16.description: Increases Burrow Charge impact area by 85% and lowers the cooldown by 4 seconds for each Hero hit.

16.name: Beetle, Juiced
16.description: Every 3rd Basic Attack against enemy Heroes spawns a Beetle.

16.name: Blood for Blood
16.description: Activate to deal 10% of target enemy Hero's Max Health and heal for twice that amount.

20.name: Hive Master
20.description: Gain a permanent Vampire Locust that attacks a nearby enemy every 3 seconds. The Vampire Locust deals 153 (+0.04 per level) damage and returns to heal you for 37 (+0.04 per level) health.

20.name: Cryptweave
20.description: Staying near the Cocoon allows Anub'arak to extend the duration by up to 4 seconds per Cocoon.

20.name: Hardened Shield
20.description: Activate to reduce damage taken by 75% for 4 seconds.

20.name: Rewind
20.description: Activate to reset the cooldowns of your Basic Abilities.

name: Artanis
title: Hierarch of the Daelaam
description: A tough Bruiser that deals high damage if the enemy team is unable to shut him down.

Artanis.name: Blade Dash
Artanis.description: Dash forward and deal 57 (+0.04 per level) damage to enemies, then return and deal 171 (+0.04 per level) damage.

Artanis.name: Twin Blades
Artanis.description: Your next Basic Attack immediately causes you to charge a short distance and strike the enemy 2 times.

Artanis.name: Phase Prism
Artanis.description: Fire a Phase Prism that deals 66 (+0.04 per level) damage to Heroes and swaps your position with theirs.

Artanis.name: Purifier Beam
Artanis.description: Target an enemy Hero with an orbital beam from the Spear of Adun, dealing 184 (+0.16 per level) damage per second for 8 seconds. The beam will chase the target as they move.  Unlimited range.

Artanis.name: Suppression Pulse
Artanis.description: Fire a large area pulse from the Spear of Adun, dealing 114 (+0.04 per level) damage and Blinding enemies for 4 seconds. Unlimited range.

Artanis.name: Shield Overload
Artanis.description: If you take damage while below 50% Health, gain a 449 (+0.04 per level) point Shield for 5 seconds. Your Basic Attacks lower the cooldown of Shield Overload by 4 seconds.

1.name: Reactive Parry
1.description: Using Twin Blades reduces damage taken from the next Hero Basic Attack by 50%.  Stores up to 2 charges.

1.name: Amateur Opponent
1.description: Twin Blades attacks deal 150% bonus damage to non-Heroes.

1.name: Seasoned Marksman
1.description: Quest: Every Minion killed near you grants 0.2 Attack Damage, and Takedowns grant 0.5 Attack Damage, to a max of 40 damage. Reward: Upon gaining 40 bonus Attack Damage, you can also activate Seasoned Marksman to increase your Attack Speed by 30% for 3 seconds. 60 second cooldown.

4.name: Shield Battery
4.description: Reduces Shield Overload's cooldown by 8 seconds if it lasts for the full duration.

4.name: Lethal Alacrity
4.description: Increases Blade Dash range and speed by 30%.

4.name: Chrono Surge
4.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with Phase Prism grants 40% bonus Attack Speed for 4 seconds.

4.name: Templar's Zeal
4.description: Blade Dash cooldown recharges 100% faster while you are below 50% Health.

7.name: Warp Sickness
7.description: Phase Prism also slows the enemy's Movement Speed by 30% for 4 seconds.

7.name: Solarite Reaper
7.description: Increases the damage of the first dash of Blade Dash by 150%.

7.name: Psionic Synergy
7.description: Every time Blade Dash hits an enemy Hero, it reduces Shield Overload's cooldown by 4 seconds.

7.name: Follow Through
7.description: After using an Ability, your next Basic Attack within 6 seconds deals 40% additional damage.

10.name: Suppression Pulse
10.description: Fire a large area pulse from the Spear of Adun, dealing 114 (+0.04 per level) damage and Blinding enemies for 4 seconds. Unlimited range.

10.name: Purifier Beam
10.description: Target an enemy Hero with an orbital beam from the Spear of Adun, dealing 184 (+0.16 per level) damage per second for 8 seconds. The beam will chase the target as they move.  Unlimited range.

13.name: Phase Bulwark
13.description: When Shield Overload activates, you take 50% less damage from Abilities for 4 seconds.

13.name: Triple Strike
13.description: Increases Twin Blades's number of Basic Attacks to 3, but increase its cooldown by 1 second.

13.name: Graviton Vortex
13.description: Phase Prism pulls and damages an additional enemy Hero near the first, and its cooldown is reduced by 6 seconds.

13.name: Burning Rage
13.description: Deal 23 (+0.04 per level) damage per second to nearby enemies.

16.name: Shield Surge
16.description: Increases Shield Overload's Shields by 100%, but decays to the normal amount over 3 seconds.

16.name: Zealot Charge
16.description: Increase Twin Blades' charge distance by 100%.

16.name: Titan Killer
16.description: Twin Blades attacks against Heroes deal an additional 2.5% of the target's maximum Health in damage.

16.name: Psionic Wound
16.description: Twin Blades final strike causes enemy Heroes to become Vulnerable for 2 seconds, increasing all damage taken by 25%.

20.name: Orbital Bombardment
20.description: Suppression Pulse gains an additional charge.  There is a 10 second cooldown between uses.

20.name: Target Purified
20.description: If the target of Purifier Beam dies, it automatically recasts on the nearest visible enemy Hero.

20.name: Force of Will
20.description: Increases Shield Overload's cooldown reduction from Basic Attacks to 6 seconds.

20.name: Nexus Blades
20.description: Basic Attacks deal 20% more damage and slow enemy Movement Speed by 20% for 1 second.

name: Arthas
title: The Lich King
description: A Tank who is proficient against melee Physical Attackers, slowing them.

Arthas.name: Death Coil
Arthas.description:
Deals 164 (+0.04 per level) damage to target enemy.
Can be self-cast to heal for 238 (+0.04 per level) Health.

Arthas.name: Howling Blast
Arthas.description: Root enemies within the target area for 1.25 seconds and deals 68 (+0.04 per level) damage.

Arthas.name: Frozen Tempest
Arthas.description: Deals 52 (+0.08 per level) damage per second to nearby enemies. Slows enemy Move Speed by 6% per second, stacking up to 30%.

Arthas.name: Army of the Dead
Arthas.description: Summons Ghouls that last 15 seconds. Sacrifice Ghouls to heal for 267 (+0.04 per level) Health.

Arthas.name: Summon Sindragosa
Arthas.description: Deals 230 (+0.04 per level) damage and slows enemies by 60% for 3.5 seconds.  Also disables non-Heroic enemies and Structures for 20 seconds.

Arthas.name: Frostmourne Hungers
Arthas.description: Activate to make your next Basic Attack strike immediately, do 100% increased damage, and restore 30 Mana.

1.name: Block
1.description: Every 5 seconds, reduce the damage taken from the next Hero Basic Attack by 75%.  Stores up to 2 charges.

1.name: Eternal Hunger
1.description: Quest: Using Frostmourne Hungers on an enemy Hero permanently increases the Mana it restores by 4, up to 40. Reward: After hitting 10 Heroes with Frostmourne Hungers, also increase its damage bonus by 25%.

1.name: Frost Presence
1.description: Howling Blast's cooldown is reduced by 5 seconds when it hits an enemy Hero.

4.name: Frozen Wastes
4.description: Frozen Tempest Mana cost reduced by 4 per second.

4.name: Deathlord
4.description: Reduces Death Coil's cooldown by 2 seconds and increase its range by 25%.

4.name: Biting Cold
4.description: Frozen Tempest damage increased by 30%.

7.name: Rune Tap
7.description: Every 3rd Basic Attack heals you for 3.9% of your max Health.

7.name: Immortal Coil
7.description: You gain the healing effect of Death Coil even when you use it on enemies. If you damage an enemy Hero with it, you also heal for an additional 100% of the damage dealt.

7.name: Icebound Fortitude
7.description: Activate to reduce damage taken by 25% and reduce the duration of stuns, slows, roots, and polymorphs against you by 75% for 3 seconds.

10.name: Army of the Dead
10.description: Summons Ghouls that last 15 seconds. Sacrifice Ghouls to heal for 267 (+0.04 per level) Health.

10.name: Summon Sindragosa
10.description: Deals 230 (+0.04 per level) damage and slows enemies by 60% for 3.5 seconds.  Also disables non-Heroic enemies and Structures for 20 seconds.

13.name: Trail of Frost
13.description: Increases Howling Blast's range by 30% and causes it to also root enemies between you and the target for 1.25 seconds.

13.name: Frost Strike
13.description: Reduces Frostmourne Hungers' cooldown by 2 seconds. Frostmourne Hungers also slows the enemy by 40% for 1.5 seconds.

13.name: Frigid Winds
13.description: Frozen Tempest reduces enemy Attack Speed by 8% per second, stacking up to 40%.

16.name: Remorseless Winter
16.description: Enemy Heroes that remain within Frozen Tempest for 3 seconds are rooted for 1.75 seconds. This effect can only happen once every 10 seconds.

16.name: Frostmourne Feeds
16.description: Increases the amount of Basic Attacks empowered by Frostmourne Hungers to 2.

16.name: Embrace Death
16.description: Death Coil deals 10% more damage for each 10% of life you are missing.

20.name: Legion of Northrend
20.description: 3 additional Ghouls are created.  Ghouls heal for an additional 50% and last 5 seconds longer.

20.name: Absolute Zero
20.description: Sindragosa flies twice as far.  Enemy Heroes are rooted for 2 seconds, and then slowed by 60% for 3.5 seconds.

20.name: Death's Advance
20.description: Passively increases your Movement Speed by 10%. Activate to increase this bonus to 30% for 3 seconds.

20.name: Anti-Magic Shell
20.description: Activate to reduce damage taken from Abilities by 100% for 3 seconds, and heal yourself for 25% of the damage prevented.

name: Auriel
title: Archangel of Hope
description: A Healer that excels when paired with a high-octane damage dealer.

name: Azmodan
title: Lord of Sin
description: A Summoner that can also deal high damage from far away.

Azmodan.name: Globe Of Annihilation
Azmodan.description: Shoot a globe of destruction, dealing 164 (+0.04 per level) damage on impact. Long range.

Azmodan.name: Summon Demon Warrior
Azmodan.description: Spawn a Demon Warrior that marches toward a point. Warriors deal 37 (+0.04 per level) damage per second and last for 10.5 seconds.

Azmodan.name: All Shall Burn
Azmodan.description: Channel a death beam on an enemy dealing 100 (+0.08 per level) damage a second. The damage amount grows the longer it is channeled, to a maximum of 200 (+0.16 per level) damage per second.  Does 25% more damage to Structures.

Azmodan.name: Black Pool
Azmodan.description: Create a pool that empowers Azmodan, his Demons, and allied Minions, increasing their Basic Attack and Ability damage by 75%. Pools last 5 seconds.

Azmodan.name: Demonic Invasion
Azmodan.description: Rain a small army of Demonic Grunts down on enemies, dealing 110 (+0.04 per level) damage per impact. Demon Grunts deal 54 (+0.04 per level) damage and have 365 (+0.04 per level) health.

Azmodan.name: General of Hell
Azmodan.description: Summon a Demon Lieutenant at an allied Mercenary, Minion, or Azmodan's Summons. The Lieutenant will march with the target, granting 15% increased damage and 15% increased maximum Health to all nearby friendly Mercenaries, Minions, and Azmodan's Summons. Unlimited range.

1.name: Taste for Blood
1.description: Quest: Enemies that die within 1 second of being hit by Globe of Annihilation increase its damage by 2, up to 500.

1.name: Sieging Wrath
1.description: Quest: Every time Globe of Annihilation hits an Hero, its damage is increased by 4, up to 100. Reward: After hitting 25 Heroes, the range of Globe of Annihilation is increased by 33% and its damage is increased by an additional 100.

1.name: Master of Destruction
1.description: Reduces the Mana cost from 16 to 10 per second. Each charge level also increases the range by 10%.

1.name: Bribe
1.description:
Enemy Minions killed near you grant a stack of Bribe. Use 20 stacks to bribe a Mercenary, instantly defeating them.  Does not work on Bosses.  Maximum of 100 stacks. If a camp is defeated entirely with Bribe, the camp respawns 50% faster.
Current number of Bribe stacks: 0

4.name: Gluttony
4.description: All Shall Burn heals you for 20% of the damage dealt.

4.name: Army of Hell
4.description: Increases Demon Warrior's damage by 20% and reduces their Mana cost by 20.

4.name: Mercenary Lord
4.description: Friendly non-Boss Mercenaries near you deal 50% more damage. Reduces damage taken from Minions and Mercenaries by 50%.

4.name: Sin's Grasp
4.description: Activate to curse an enemy Hero, dealing 247.5 (+0.36 per level) damage over 8 seconds. Minion kills reduce this cooldown by 5 seconds. Can be cast while channeling All Shall Burn.

7.name: Infernal Globe
7.description: Globe of Annihilation's cast time is decreased by 40% and its missile speed is increased by 40%.

7.name: Bound Minion
7.description: Using General of Hell on a Minion decreases the non-Heroic damage they take by 75% and increases the damage they deal to non-Heroic targets by 100%. Lasts 30 seconds.

7.name: Gluttonous Ward
7.description: Activate to place a ward on the ground that restores 3.276% of your maximum Health and Mana every second for 10 seconds. Can be cast while channeling All Shall Burn.

7.name: March of Sin
7.description: Azmodan can move at 75% speed while channeling All Shall Burn.

10.name: Demonic Invasion
10.description: Rain a small army of Demonic Grunts down on enemies, dealing 110 (+0.04 per level) damage per impact. Demon Grunts deal 54 (+0.04 per level) damage and have 365 (+0.04 per level) health.

10.name: Black Pool
10.description: Create a pool that empowers Azmodan, his Demons, and allied Minions, increasing their Basic Attack and Ability damage by 75%. Pools last 5 seconds.

13.name: Hellforged Armor
13.description: Demon Warriors deal 10 (+0.04 per level) damage to nearby enemies every second and take 50% less damage from non-Heroic sources.

13.name: Hedonism
13.description: Reduces Globe of Annihilation's Mana cost by 30.

13.name: Infused Power
13.description: All Shall Burn gains an additional charge level, increasing its maximum damage by 40%.

13.name: Relentless
13.description: Reduces the duration of stuns, slows, and roots against your Hero by 50%.

16.name: Battleborn
16.description: If Globe of Annihilation hits an enemy, a Demon Warrior is summoned at the impact point.

16.name: Demonic Smite
16.description: Demon Lieutenants will periodically blast non-Heroic units with demonic energy, dealing 411 (+0.04 per level) damage.

16.name: Imposing Presence
16.description: Heroes and Summons that attack you have their Attack Speed slowed by 40%.

16.name: Sin for Sin
16.description: Activate to deal 10% of target enemy Hero's Max Health and heal for twice that amount. Can be cast while channeling All Shall Burn.

20.name: Perishing Flame
20.description: When the Grunts die they explode, dealing 68 (+0.04 per level) damage to nearby enemies.

20.name: Fifth Circle
20.description: Black Pool makes Basic Attacks and Abilities slow enemies Attack and Movement Speeds by 40% for 3 seconds.

20.name: Bolt of the Storm
20.description: Activate to teleport to a nearby location.

20.name: Forced Recruitment
20.description: Reduces General of Hell's cooldown by 10 seconds and gains an additional charge.

name: Brightwing
title: Faerie Dragon
description: A Healer who can teleport to allies, excelling on large battleground.

FaerieDragon.name: Arcane Flare
FaerieDragon.description: Deal 274 (+0.04 per level) damage in a small area and 91 (+0.04 per level) damage in a larger area.

FaerieDragon.name: Polymorph
FaerieDragon.description: Target is slowed by 25% Movement Speed, and cannot attack and is Silenced making them unable to use Abilities for 1.25 seconds.

FaerieDragon.name: Pixie Dust
FaerieDragon.description: Increase targets Movement Speed by 20%, and reduces their damage taken from the next 2 Hero Basic Attacks by 75%. Lasts 4 seconds.

FaerieDragon.name: Blink Heal
FaerieDragon.description: Teleport to a nearby ally, healing them for 204 (+0.04 per level).  Can store 2 charges.

FaerieDragon.name: Emerald Wind
FaerieDragon.description: Create an expanding nova of wind, dealing 319 (+0.04 per level) damage and pushing enemies away. Also passively increases the healing of Soothing Mist by 8%.

FaerieDragon.name: Soothing Mist
FaerieDragon.description: Brightwing heals nearby allied Heroes for 120 (+0.04 per level) every 4 seconds.

FaerieDragon.name: Phase Shift
FaerieDragon.description: Instead of mounting, teleport to an allied Hero.

1.name: Dream Shot
1.description: Reduces the cooldown of Arcane Flare by 1 second for each enemy Hero hit by the outer radius, and 3 seconds for each hit by the inner radius.

1.name: Unfurling Spray
1.description: Increases Soothing Mist's range by 33.3%.

1.name: Hyper Shift
1.description: Each allied Hero healed by Soothing Mist reduces the cooldown of Phase Shift by 2 seconds.

1.name: Bribe
1.description:
Enemy Minions killed near you grant a stack of Bribe. Use 20 stacks to bribe a Mercenary, instantly defeating them.  Does not work on Bosses.  Maximum of 100 stacks. If a camp is defeated entirely with Bribe, the camp respawns 50% faster.
Current number of Bribe stacks: 0

4.name: Arcane Barrage
4.description: Increases the range of Arcane Flare by 50%.

4.name: Unstable Anomaly
4.description: When Polymorph ends, deal 114 (+0.04 per level) damage to the target and all nearby enemies.

4.name: Manic Pixie
4.description: When Soothing Mist heals an ally with Pixie Dust on them, they heal for an additional 104 (+0.16 per level) over 4 seconds.

4.name: Peekaboo!
4.description: Phase Shifting to an ally reveals a large area around them and all enemies in it for 6 seconds.

7.name: Mistified
7.description: Reduces the cooldown of Soothing Mist by 0.75 seconds every time you cast a Basic Ability.

7.name: Phase Shield
7.description: After finishing the teleport, the target of your Phase Shift gains a 400 (+0.04 per level) point Shield for 10 seconds.

7.name: Cleanse
7.description: Activate to make target ally Unstoppable for 1 second. Cannot be cast on yourself.

10.name: Blink Heal
10.description: Teleport to a nearby ally, healing them for 204 (+0.04 per level).  Can store 2 charges.

10.name: Emerald Wind
10.description: Create an expanding nova of wind, dealing 319 (+0.04 per level) damage and pushing enemies away. Also passively increases the healing of Soothing Mist by 8%.

13.name: Sticky Flare
13.description: Targets are slowed by 40% Movement Speed for 2 seconds.

13.name: Pixie Boost
13.description: Pixie Dust gives 50% bonus Move Speed, decaying to 20% over 1.5 seconds.

13.name: Shield Dust
13.description: Pixie Dust reduces Ability damage taken by 50%.

13.name: Ice Block
13.description: Activate to place yourself in Stasis and gain Invulnerability for 3 seconds.

16.name: Greater Polymorph
16.description: Increases the duration of Polymorph by 0.75 seconds.

16.name: Critterize
16.description: Polymorph makes enemies Vulnerable, increasing the damage they take by 25%.

16.name: Bouncy Dust
16.description: Pixie Dust bounces to another nearby ally upon impact.

16.name: Hardened Focus
16.description: While above 80% life, your Basic Ability cooldowns regenerate 50% faster.

20.name: Double Wyrmhole
20.description: Blink Heal can be cast a second time on a different target within 2 seconds without consuming a charge.

20.name: Continuous Winds
20.description: Emerald Wind releases two additional novas that deal 25% damage. Also further increases the healing bonus of Soothing Mist by 7%.

20.name: Revitalizing Mist
20.description: Healing another Hero with Soothing Mist increases their healing received from Soothing Mist by 25% for 6 seconds. Stacks 3 times.

20.name: Storm Shield
20.description: Activate to give all nearby allied Heroes a Shield for 20% of their max Health for 3 seconds.

name: Cassia
title: Amazon Warmatron
description: An Assassin who specializes against Physical Attackers

name: Chen
title: Legendary Brewmaster
description: A potent Bruiser that will dominate if the enemy team is lacking mobility.

Chen.name: Flying Kick
Chen.description: Kick through target enemy, dealing 112 (+0.04 per level) damage.

Chen.name: Keg Smash
Chen.description: Smash your keg, dealing 50 (+0.04 per level) damage and drenching affected enemies in Brew, slowing them by 25% for 3 seconds.

Chen.name: Breath of Fire
Chen.description: Breathe a cone of flames, dealing 96 (+0.04 per level) damage. Enemies soaked in Brew are set on fire, dealing 96 (+0.12 per level) damage over 3 seconds.

Chen.name: Storm, Earth, Fire
Chen.description:
Split into three elemental spirits for 15.15 seconds, each with 50% of your maximum Health, and enables two new leaping attacks for use.
Storm attacks at range for 59 (+0.04 per level) damage. 
Earth attacks slowly for 37 (+0.04 per level) damage and slows enemies by 25%. 
Fire attacks quickly for 17 (+0.04 per level) damage.

Chen.name: Wandering Keg
Chen.description: Roll around inside an Unstoppable barrel, dealing 59 (+0.04 per level) damage to enemies in the way and knocking them back. Lasts for 5 seconds.

Chen.name: Fortifying Brew
Chen.description: Drink from your keg, gaining 40 Brew and 212 (+0.08 per level) temporary Shields per second, up to a maximum of 636 (+0.24 per level) while drinking. Shields persist for 2 seconds after you stop drinking.

1.name: Regeneration Master
1.description: Quest: Gathering a Regeneration Globe increases your Health Regeneration by 1 per second, up to 30. Reward: After gathering 30 Regeneration Globes, you also gain 500 Health.

1.name: Keg Toss
1.description: Increase Keg Smash range by 125%.

1.name: Grounding Brew
1.description: Fortifying Brew reduces all incoming Ability Damage by 25% while drinking.

1.name: Consuming Flame
1.description: Breath of Fire's burn effect when used on Brew-soaked targets is increased by 2 seconds.

4.name: Swift Reflexes
4.description: Every 4 seconds Chen can dodge an enemy Hero's Basic Attack, preventing all of its damage.

4.name: Deadly Strike
4.description: Increase the damage of Flying Kick by 50%.

4.name: Amplified Healing
4.description: Increases regeneration effects and all healing received by 30%.

4.name: Deep Breath
4.description: Increases Breath of Fire's range and arc by 30% and the Brew cost is reduced by 10.

7.name: Full Keg
7.description: Increases Keg Smash's damage and radius by 50%.

7.name: Combat Stance
7.description: Shields from Fortifying Brew last for an additional 3 seconds after drinking stops.

7.name: Brewmaster's Balance
7.description: While at or below 50 Brew, gain 20% Movement Speed. While at or above 50 Brew, regenerate an additional 18 (+0.04 per level) Health per second.

7.name: Ring of Fire
7.description: After using Breath of Fire, ignite in a fiery aura, dealing 30 (+0.04 per level) damage every second to nearby enemies for 5 seconds.

10.name: Wandering Keg
10.description: Roll around inside an Unstoppable barrel, dealing 59 (+0.04 per level) damage to enemies in the way and knocking them back. Lasts for 5 seconds.

10.name: Storm, Earth, Fire
10.description:
Split into three elemental spirits for 15.15 seconds, each with 50% of your maximum Health, and enables two new leaping attacks for use.
Storm attacks at range for 59 (+0.04 per level) damage. 
Earth attacks slowly for 37 (+0.04 per level) damage and slows enemies by 25%. 
Fire attacks quickly for 17 (+0.04 per level) damage.

13.name: Brew Strike
13.description: Keg Smash reduces the cooldown of Flying Kick by 1 second for each enemy Hero hit.

13.name: A Touch of Honey
13.description: Increase the slow from Keg Smash to 40%.

13.name: Enough to Share
13.description: Fortifying Brew also Shields nearby allied Heroes for 54 (+0.08 per level) per second.

13.name: Relentless
13.description: Reduces the duration of stuns, slows, and roots against your Hero by 50%.

16.name: Bottomless Mug
16.description: Reduces Fortifying Brew's cooldown by 2 seconds.

16.name: Bolder Flavor
16.description: Increase Shield generation rate and maximum amount from Fortifying Brew by 40%.

16.name: Pressure Point
16.description: Flying Kick slows the target enemy by 90% for 1 second.

16.name: Combination Attack
16.description: The next Basic Attack after using Flying Kick deals 100% bonus damage.

20.name: Untapped Potential
20.description: Increases duration by 2 seconds. Additionally, gain an extra 5% Movement Speed whenever an enemy is hit, up to 100%.

20.name: Elemental Conduit
20.description: Using an Ability will cause one of the elemental spirits to fight with you for 4 seconds. Only one spirit can be active at a time.

20.name: Hardened Shield
20.description: Activate to reduce damage taken by 75% for 4 seconds.

20.name: Bolt of the Storm
20.description: Activate to teleport to a nearby location.

name: Cho
title: Twilight's Hammer Chieftain
description: Head 1 of a 2 Headed Hero, Cho controls the body of Cho'Gall.

Cho.name: Surging Fist
Cho.description: Wind up for at least 1 second temporarily slowing yourself, then reactivate to charge in a direction. Enemies in your path are knocked aside and take 46 (+0.04 per level) damage.

Cho.name: Consuming Blaze
Cho.description: Ignite nearby enemies, dealing 133.875 (+0.315 per level) damage over 3.9375 seconds. If this hits an enemy, gain 272 (+0.32 per level) Health over 4 seconds.

Cho.name: Rune Bomb
Cho.description: Roll a bomb dealing 91 (+0.04 per level) damage to enemies in its path. Gall can use Runic Blast to detonate it to deal 274 (+0.04 per level) damage in an area.

Cho.name: Upheaval
Cho.description: After 1 second pull enemies towards your direction, slowing them by 25% for 3 seconds and dealing 100 (+0.04 per level) damage.

Cho.name: Hammer of Twilight
Cho.description: Passively increases Basic Attack damage by 25%. Activate to swing the Hammer to deal 156.25 (+0.045 per level) damage, push enemies away, and stun for 0.75 seconds.

Cho.name: Two-Headed
Cho.description: Gall is permanently attached to you, going where you go.

1.name: Surging Dash
1.description: Increases Surging Fist range and speed by 50%.

1.name: Blazing Bulwark
1.description: Consuming Blaze grants you 1 stack of Block when you hit an enemy Hero, up to 10. Block reduces damage taken from enemy Basic Attacks by 50%.

1.name: Fuel for the Flame
1.description: Gathering a Regeneration Globe increases the duration of your next Consuming Blaze heal by 75%.

4.name: Runed Gauntlet
4.description: Rune Bomb increases your next Basic Attack by 75%.

4.name: Rollback
4.description: Rune Bomb now returns to you, damaging enemies in its path.

4.name: Seared Flesh
4.description: Every third consecutive Basic Attack against the same target deals 75% bonus damage.

7.name: Power Surge
7.description: Reduces the initial delay of Surging Fist by 50% and it is 100% wider.

7.name: Fire Eater
7.description: Basic Attacks against targets inflicted with Consuming Blaze heal you for 50% of the damage dealt.

7.name: I AM Hurrying!
7.description: Increases the duration of Gall's "Hurry Up, Oaf!" by 1.5 seconds and it no longer fades over time.

10.name: Hammer of Twilight
10.description: Passively increases Basic Attack damage by 25%. Activate to swing the Hammer to deal 156.25 (+0.045 per level) damage, push enemies away, and stun for 0.75 seconds.

10.name: Upheaval
10.description: After 1 second pull enemies towards your direction, slowing them by 25% for 3 seconds and dealing 100 (+0.04 per level) damage.

13.name: Runic Feedback
13.description: Gall's Runic Blast reduces your Rune Bomb cooldown by 1 second per enemy hit.

13.name: Surge of Stamina
13.description: After using Surging Fist, the duration of stuns, slows, roots, and polymorphs applied to you are reduced by 50% for 5 seconds.

13.name: Molten Block
13.description: Activate to place yourself in Stasis and gain Invulnerability for 3 seconds, damaging nearby enemies for 92 (+0.08 per level) damage per second.

16.name: Twilight Veil
16.description: Consuming Blaze reduces damage taken from Abilities by 50% for 2 seconds per enemy Hero hit.

16.name: Frenzied Fists
16.description: If Surging Fist hits an enemy Hero, your Attack Speed is increased by 100% for 4 seconds.

16.name: Crippling Blow
16.description: Enemies hit by Surging Fist are slowed by 90% for 1.25 seconds.

20.name: C'thun's Gift
20.description: Your Basic Attack becomes ranged and slows targets by 20% for 2 seconds.

20.name: Favor of the Old Gods
20.description: Upheaval grants you Resistant, reducing your damage taken by 50% for 5 seconds.

20.name: The Will Of Gall
20.description: Gall can activate Will of Gall to make you Unstoppable for 2 seconds.  60 second cooldown.

name: Chromie
title: Keeper of Time
description: A long range, high burst damage Mage, who requires good timing and setup.

Chromie.name: Sand Blast
Chromie.description: After 1 second, fire a missile that deals 400 (+0.04 per level) damage to the first enemy Hero hit.

Chromie.name: Dragon’s Breath
Chromie.description: Fire a blast into the air that lands after 1.5 seconds, dealing 480 (+0.04 per level) damage to enemies in an area.  Enemies cannot see where the blast will land.

Chromie.name: Time Trap
Chromie.description: Place a Time Trap that arms and Stealths after 2 seconds. The first enemy Hero to touch it will be put into Stasis for 2 seconds. Only 1 trap can exist at once.

Chromie.name: Temporal Loop
Chromie.description: Choose an enemy Hero. After 3 seconds, they will teleport back to the location where you cast Temporal Loop on them.

Chromie.name: Slowing Sands
Chromie.description: Place a sand vortex that greatly slows enemies inside it. The longer it is active the more it slows, up to 50% after 5 seconds.

Chromie.name: Timewalker
Chromie.description: You've traveled to the future, and as such, will learn your Talents 1 level earlier than your teammates!

1.name: Compounding Aether
1.description: Reward: After hitting 25 Heroes with Sand Blast increase its damage by 100.

1.name: Deep Breathing
1.description: Quest: Every time Dragon’s Breath hits a Hero increase its damage by 2, up to 50. Reward: After hitting 25 Heroes, increase its damage by an additional 150 and also increase your sight radius by 100%.

1.name: Timewalker's Pursuit
1.description: Quest: Gathering a Regeneration Globe increases your Mana Regeneration by 0.1015, up to 1.5225. Reward: After gathering 15 Globes you also gain 5% Ability Power.

1.name: Peer Into The Future
1.description: Activate to reveal the targeted area for 2 seconds. Enemies seen are revealed for 4 seconds.

4.name: Piercing Sands
4.description: Sand Blast will now hit the first two Heroes in its path.

4.name: Bronze Talons
4.description: Increases your Basic Attack range by 35%. Using Sand Blast increases the damage of your next Basic Attack by 250%.

4.name: Enveloping Assault
4.description: Increases Dragon's Breath's radius by 25%.

7.name: Mobius Loop
7.description: Reduces Dragon’s Breath's Mana cost and cooldown by 40%, but also reduces its damage by 25%.

7.name: Dragon’s Eye
7.description: Dragon’s Breath does 25% more damage to enemies in the center.

7.name: Chrono Sickness
7.description: Reduces Time Trap's cooldown by 50%. After the Stasis ends, the enemy is also slowed by 50% for 3 seconds.

10.name: Slowing Sands
10.description: Place a sand vortex that greatly slows enemies inside it. The longer it is active the more it slows, up to 50% after 5 seconds.

10.name: Temporal Loop
10.description: Choose an enemy Hero. After 3 seconds, they will teleport back to the location where you cast Temporal Loop on them.

13.name: Bye Bye!
13.description: Reduces the cast time of your Hearthstone by 75%, and it is not interrupted by taking damage.

13.name: Reaching through Time
13.description: Increases Sand Blast and Dragon’s Breath's range by 25%.

13.name: Time Out
13.description: Activate to place yourself in Stasis and gain Invulnerability for up to 7 seconds. Can be reactivated to end the effect early.

16.name: Shifting Sands
16.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with Sand Blast increases your Ability Power by 8% for the next 10 seconds. This bonus can be stacked up to 40%, and the duration is refreshed whenever you damage enemy Heroes with Sand Blast.

16.name: Fast Forward
16.description: If Sand Blast travels at least 75% of its base distance and hits a Hero, its cooldown is reduced to 0.75 seconds.

16.name: Quantum Overdrive
16.description: Activate to increase Ability Power by 20% for 10 seconds.

20.name: Pocket of Time
20.description: Removes Slowing Sands Mana cost and increases the slow from 50% to 70%.

20.name: Loophole
20.description: Temporal Loop hits all enemy Heroes near your initial target.

20.name: Past and Future Me
20.description: After casting Sand Blast, leave an echo of yourself behind. The next time you cast Sand Blast, the echo also casts an untalented Sand Blast that does 50% damage.

20.name: Andorhal Anomaly
20.description: You gain 3 charges of Time Trap, and can have 3 active at once.  When your cooldown finishes, you gain 3 charges at once.

name: Dehaka
title: Primal Pack Leader
description: A Bruiser with a strong, global presence that can effectively clear groups of minions.

Dehaka.name: Drag
Dehaka.description:
Lash out with your tongue, dealing 160 (+0.04 per level) damage to the first enemy hit, stunning and dragging them with you for <C val="#TooltipNumbers">1.75 seconds.
If you are stunned or silenced while using Drag, the effect ends.

Dehaka.name: Dark Swarm
Dehaka.description: Deal 60 (+0.04 per level) damage a second to nearby enemies for 3 seconds, and become able to move through units.  Deals double damage to Heroes.  Can be cast during Drag and Burrow.

Dehaka.name: Burrow
Dehaka.description: Burrow into the ground, entering Stasis and becoming Invulnerable for <C val="#TooltipNumbers">2 seconds.

Dehaka.name: Isolation
Dehaka.description: Launch biomass that hits the first enemy Hero dealing 200 (+0.04 per level) damage, silencing and slowing them <C val="#TooltipNumbers">30% for <C val="#TooltipNumbers">3 seconds. Only allows them to see a very short distance for <C val="#TooltipNumbers">6 seconds.

Dehaka.name: Adaptation
Dehaka.description: After 4 seconds, heal for 60% of the damage you took over this period.

Dehaka.name: Essence Collection
Dehaka.description: Gain 10 Essence from Takedowns and 2 Essence from nearby Minions dying.  Activate to consume all Essence and heal yourself for 29 (+0.04 per level) Health over 5 seconds for each Essence stored.  Maximum of 50 Essence.  Can be cast during Drag and Burrow.

1.name: Enduring Swarm
1.description: Dark Swarm reduces the damage of the next two Abilities made against you by 50%.

1.name: Primal Aggression
1.description: Dark Swarm duration increased by 0.5 seconds and it deals 100% bonus damage to Minions and Mercenaries.

1.name: Enhanced Agility
1.description: Quest: Each time you collect 50 Essence, permanently increase your Movement Speed by 1.5%, up to 15%.

1.name: Tissue Regeneration
1.description: Quest: Each time you collect 50 Essence, permanently increase your Health Regeneration by 5, up to 50.

4.name: Lurker Strain
4.description: Burrow grants Stealth for 5 seconds.

4.name: Numbing Eruption
4.description: Emerging from Burrow knocks nearby enemies back and slows them by 30% for 2 seconds.

4.name: One-Who-Collects
4.description: Increases Essence collected from Minions by 50%.

4.name: Hero Stalker
4.description: Increases Essence gained from Takedowns by 150%.

7.name: Feeding Frenzy
7.description: Basic Attacks reduce Drag's cooldown by 1.5 seconds.

7.name: Constriction
7.description: Increases Drag duration by 0.5 seconds.

7.name: Symbiosis
7.description: Every time Dark Swarm damages an enemy Hero, reduce its cooldown by 0.5 seconds.

7.name: Essence Devourer
7.description: Quest: Gathering Regeneration Globes grant 10 Essence and increase your maximum Essence by 1, to a maximum of 10 increased Essence. Reward: After collecting 10 Regeneration Globes, the amount of Essence you gain from Regeneration Globes is increased to 15.

10.name: Isolation
10.description: Launch biomass that hits the first enemy Hero dealing 200 (+0.04 per level) damage, silencing and slowing them <C val="#TooltipNumbers">30% for <C val="#TooltipNumbers">3 seconds. Only allows them to see a very short distance for <C val="#TooltipNumbers">6 seconds.

10.name: Adaptation
10.description: After 4 seconds, heal for 60% of the damage you took over this period.

13.name: Swift Pursuit
13.description: Increases your Movement Speed by 20% while in a bush and 2 seconds after leaving.

13.name: Ferocious Stalker
13.description: Brushstalker increases your Movement Speed by 60% decaying over 3 seconds.

13.name: Whirling Dervish
13.description: Reduces the duration of stuns, slows, and roots against your Hero while Dark Swarm is active by 50%.

16.name: Paralyzing Enzymes
16.description: Drag slows enemies by 50% for 2 seconds after it ends.

16.name: Elongated Tongue
16.description: Increase Drag range by 20%.

16.name: Rapid Regeneration
16.description: Burrow heals you for 360 (+0.16 per level) Health over 2 seconds.

20.name: Contagion
20.description: Isolation hits all Heroes near the first target.

20.name: Change Is Survival
20.description: Increases Adaptation healing to 125% of the damage received and reduces the cooldown by 30 seconds.

20.name: Apex Predator
20.description: Reduces Brushstalker's cooldown by 25 seconds and the cast time by 0.5 seconds.

20.name: Hardened Shield
20.description: Activate to reduce damage taken by 75% for 4 seconds.

name: Diablo
title: Lord of Terror
description: A risky Tank who can devastate an enemy team with his "all-in" combo potential.

Diablo.name: Shadow Charge
Diablo.description: Charge an enemy, knocking them back, dealing 94 (+0.04 per level) damage. If the enemy collides with terrain, they are stunned for 1 second instead.

Diablo.name: Fire Stomp
Diablo.description: Unleashes fire waves in all directions that deal 106 (+0.04 per level) damage each.

Diablo.name: Overpower
Diablo.description: Grabs the target and slams it behind Diablo, dealing 73 (+0.04 per level) damage and stunning for 0.25 seconds.

Diablo.name: Apocalypse
Diablo.description: Create a demonic rune under each enemy Hero on the battleground. After 1.75 seconds the rune explodes dealing 137 (+0.04 per level) damage and stunning for 1.75 seconds.

Diablo.name: Lightning Breath
Diablo.description: Become Unstoppable while channeling lightning that deals 800 (+0.32 per level) damage over 4 seconds.  The direction of the Lightning changes with your mouse cursor position.

Diablo.name: Black Soulstone
Diablo.description: Gain 10 Souls per Hero killed and 1 Soul per Minion. For each Soul, gain <w>0.2%</w> maximum Health. If you have 100 Souls upon dying, you resurrect in 5 seconds and lose 100 Souls.  Maximum 100 Souls.

1.name: Block
1.description: Every 5 seconds, reduce the damage taken from the next Hero Basic Attack by 75%.  Stores up to 2 charges.

1.name: Soul Feast
1.description: Black Soulstone increases your Health Regeneration by 3% per Soul.

1.name: Devil's Due
1.description: Reduces Black Soulstone's resurrection cost to 60 Souls.

1.name: Overwhelming Force
1.description: Increases the range and knockback of Shadow Charge by 25%.

4.name: Demonic Strength
4.description: Once Overpower's stun expires, the target is slowed by 25% for 2 seconds.

4.name: Soul Catcher
4.description: Black Soulstone passively generates a Soul every 4 seconds.

4.name: Fire Devil
4.description: Fire Stomp also surrounds you in flames that deal 17 (+0.04 per level) damage every second for 6 seconds.

4.name: Essence of the Slain
4.description: When enemy Minions and Heroes die near you, gain 26.4687 (+0.04 per level) Health and 10 Mana.

7.name: Diabolical Momentum
7.description: Basic Attacks reduce your Basic Ability cooldowns by 0.75 seconds.

7.name: Soul Steal
7.description: Increases the amount of Health gained from Black Soulstone by 50%.

7.name: From the Shadows
7.description: Enemies knocked against unpathable locations are stunned for an additional 0.5 seconds.

7.name: Devastating Charge
7.description: Shadow Charge reduces the duration of stuns, slows, and roots against you by 50% for 6 seconds.

10.name: Apocalypse
10.description: Create a demonic rune under each enemy Hero on the battleground. After 1.75 seconds the rune explodes dealing 137 (+0.04 per level) damage and stunning for 1.75 seconds.

10.name: Lightning Breath
10.description: Become Unstoppable while channeling lightning that deals 800 (+0.32 per level) damage over 4 seconds.  The direction of the Lightning changes with your mouse cursor position.

13.name: Life Leech
13.description: Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes deal bonus damage equal to 1% of the Hero's maximum Health and heal you for the same amount.

13.name: Firestorm
13.description: Fire Stomp waves return to you, dealing 125% damage.

13.name: Spell Shield
13.description: Upon taking Ability Damage, reduce that damage and further Ability Damage by 50% for 3 seconds.  Can only trigger once every 30 seconds.

13.name: Siphon the Dead
13.description: Activate to heal 15.6% of your maximum Health over 3 seconds.

16.name: Rampage
16.description: Fire Stomp increases Diablo's Movement Speed by 20% and Basic Attack damage by 50% for 2 seconds.

16.name: Continuous Overpower
16.description: Overpower can store 2 charges.

16.name: Domination
16.description: Overpower reduces the cooldown of Shadow Charge by 10 seconds.

16.name: Imposing Presence
16.description: Heroes and Summons that attack you have their Attack Speed slowed by 40%.

20.name: Dying Breath
20.description: Apocalypse's cooldown is reduced by 20 seconds and is cast for free when you die.

20.name: Hellstorm
20.description: Lightning Breath lasts and reaches 50% longer.

20.name: Lord of Terror
20.description: Activate to steal 10% of the maximum Health of nearby enemy Heroes.

20.name: Bolt of the Storm
20.description: Activate to teleport to a nearby location.

name: E.T.C.
title: Rock God
description: A Tank who supplies his team with a good bit of utility.

ETC.name: Powerslide
ETC.description: Slide to a location dealing 91 (+0.04 per level) damage and stunning enemies hit for 1.25 second.

ETC.name: Face Melt
ETC.description: Deals 68 (+0.04 per level) damage to nearby enemies, knocking them back.

ETC.name: Guitar Solo
ETC.description: Regenerate 66 (+0.04 per level) Health per second for 4 seconds.

ETC.name: Mosh Pit
ETC.description: After 0.75 seconds, channel to stun nearby enemies for 4 seconds.

ETC.name: Stage Dive
ETC.description: Leap to target location, landing after 2.75 seconds, dealing 330 (+0.04 per level) damage to enemies in the area, and slowing them by 50% for 3 seconds.

ETC.name: Rockstar
ETC.description: When you use a Basic or Heroic ability, give 20% Attack Speed for 4 seconds to all nearby allied Heroes.

1.name: Rolling Like a Stone
1.description: Increases the range of Powerslide by 25%.

1.name: Block
1.description: Every 5 seconds, reduce the damage taken from the next Hero Basic Attack by 75%.  Stores up to 2 charges.

1.name: Pwn Shop Guitar
1.description: Reduces Guitar Solo's Mana cost by 60%.

1.name: Prog Rock
1.description: Quest: Gathering a Regeneration Globe permanently increases the healing per second of Guitar Solo by 3.

4.name: Double-Necked Guitar
4.description: Increases Powerslide's width by 100% and you slide 30% faster.

4.name: Hammer-on
4.description: Rockstar lasts 2 seconds longer, and while Rockstar is active your Abilities cost 10 less Mana.

4.name: Mic Check
4.description: Hitting at least 3 targets with Face Melt reduces its cooldown by 5 seconds.

4.name: Pinball Wizard
4.description: Face Melt does 50% more damage to enemies recently affected by Powerslide.

7.name: Loud Speakers
7.description: Increases Face Melt range and knockback by 50%.

7.name: Guitar Hero
7.description: While Guitar Solo is active, you heal for 50% of the damage dealt by Basic Attacks.

7.name: Just Keep Rockin'
7.description: While Guitar Solo is active, the duration of stuns, slows, roots, and polymorphs are reduced by 50%.

7.name: Follow Through
7.description: After using an Ability, your next Basic Attack within 6 seconds deals 40% additional damage.

10.name: Mosh Pit
10.description: After 0.75 seconds, channel to stun nearby enemies for 4 seconds.

10.name: Stage Dive
10.description: Leap to target location, landing after 2.75 seconds, dealing 330 (+0.04 per level) damage to enemies in the area, and slowing them by 50% for 3 seconds.

13.name: Groupies
13.description: Guitar Solo also heals nearby allied Heroes for 66 (+0.04 per level) Health every second while it is active.

13.name: Face Smelt
13.description: Face Melt slows enemies by 80% fading over 2 seconds.

13.name: Show Stopper
13.description: Reduces all damage taken by 25% for 4 seconds after using Powerslide.

13.name: Spell Shield
13.description: Upon taking Ability Damage, reduce that damage and further Ability Damage by 50% for 3 seconds.  Can only trigger once every 30 seconds.

16.name: Speed Metal
16.description: Rockstar also gives 20% Movement Speed for 2 seconds.

16.name: Echo Pedal
16.description: Using a Basic or Heroic Ability releases two pulses of 59 (+0.04 per level) damage. The first occurs instantly, the second occurs 2 seconds later.

16.name: Encore
16.description: Face Melt leaves an Amp behind, which will knock enemies away again 2 seconds later.

16.name: Imposing Presence
16.description: Heroes and Summons that attack you have their Attack Speed slowed by 40%.

20.name: Tour Bus
20.description: Mosh Pit refreshes the cooldown of Powerslide. You can Powerslide during Mosh Pit, which also increases its duration by 2 seconds.

20.name: Crowd Pleaser
20.description: Stage Dive's impact area is 50% bigger, and its cooldown is reduced by 15 seconds for every enemy Hero hit.

20.name: Death Metal
20.description: Upon dying, a ghost uses Mosh Pit at your location.

20.name: Storm Shield
20.description: Activate to give all nearby allied Heroes a Shield for 20% of their max Health for 3 seconds.

20.name: Bolt of the Storm
20.description: Activate to teleport to a nearby location.

name: Falstad
title: Wildhammer Thane
description: An Assassin that can fly large distances, excelling on large battleground.

Falstad.name: Hammerang
Falstad.description: Throw out a Hammer that returns to you, dealing 132 (+0.04 per level) damage and slowing enemies by 25% for 2 seconds.

Falstad.name: Lightning Rod
Falstad.description: Deal 107 (+0.04 per level) to an enemy, and an additional 75 (+0.04 per level) damage per second for 4.25 seconds if you remain close to the target.

Falstad.name: Barrel Roll
Falstad.description: Dashes forward and grants a 171 (+0.04 per level) point Shield for 3 seconds.

Falstad.name: Mighty Gust
Falstad.description: Push enemies away, and slow their Movement Speed by 60% decaying over 5 seconds.

Falstad.name: Hinterland Blast
Falstad.description: After a short delay, deal 475 (+0.0475 per level) damage to enemies within a long line.

Falstad.name: Tailwind
Falstad.description: Gain 20% increased Movement Speed after not taking damage for 6 seconds.

Falstad.name: Flight
Falstad.description: Instead of mounting, you can fly a great distance over terrain.

1.name: Gathering Storm
1.description: Quest: Every time Hammerang hits a Hero increase its damage by 2.

1.name: Seasoned Marksman
1.description: Quest: Every Minion killed near you grants 0.2 Attack Damage, and Takedowns grant 0.5 Attack Damage, to a max of 40 damage. Reward: Upon gaining 40 bonus Attack Damage, you can also activate Seasoned Marksman to increase your Attack Speed by 30% for 3 seconds. 60 second cooldown.

1.name: Bribe
1.description:
Enemy Minions killed near you grant a stack of Bribe. Use 20 stacks to bribe a Mercenary, instantly defeating them.  Does not work on Bosses.  Maximum of 100 stacks. If a camp is defeated entirely with Bribe, the camp respawns 50% faster.
Current number of Bribe stacks: 0

4.name: Static Shield
4.description: Gain a Shield equal to 4% of your maximum Health after every Lightning Rod strike. Lasts 4 seconds and stacks.

4.name: Updraft
4.description: Increases Barrel Roll's range and Shield amount by 40%.

4.name: Hammer Gains
4.description: Basic Attacks heal for 20% of the damage dealt to the primary target.

7.name: Secret Weapon
7.description: Increases Hammerang's range by 30% and Basic Attacks deal 60% bonus damage while Hammerang is in flight.

7.name: BOOMerang
7.description: Reactivate Hammerang mid-flight to deal 175 (+0.04 per level) damage around the Hammer.

7.name: Charged Up
7.description: Increases the number of Lightning Rod strikes by 2 and its range by 15%.

10.name: Hinterland Blast
10.description: After a short delay, deal 475 (+0.0475 per level) damage to enemies within a long line.

10.name: Mighty Gust
10.description: Push enemies away, and slow their Movement Speed by 60% decaying over 5 seconds.

13.name: Thunderstrikes
13.description: Lightning Rod deals 20% more damage each subsequent strike.

13.name: Flow Rider
13.description: While Tailwind is active, your Basic Abilities recharge 100% faster.

13.name: Giant Killer
13.description: Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes deal bonus damage equal to 1.5% of the Hero's maximum Health.

16.name: Crippling Hammer
16.description: Increases Hammerang's slow from 25% to 50%.

16.name: Aerie Gusts
16.description: Reduces the activation time for Tailwind from 6 to 2 seconds, and increases the Movement Speed bonus from 20% to 30%.

16.name: Afterburner
16.description: Barrel Roll increases your Movement Speed by 60%, decaying over 3 seconds.

20.name: Call of the Wildhammer
20.description: Hinterland Blast has double the range and deals 25% more damage.

20.name: Wind Tunnel
20.description: Mighty Gust creates a wind tunnel for 4 seconds. Enemies caught in the tunnel will periodically be pushed back.

20.name: Nexus Frenzy
20.description: Increases Attack Speed by 20% and Attack Range by 20%.

20.name: Epic Mount
20.description: Reduce the cooldown of Flight to 25 seconds, reduce the cast time before flying to 0.5 seconds, and increase the speed by 50%.

name: Gall
title: Twilight's Hammer Chieftain
description: Head 2 of a 2 Headed Hero, Gall is a powerful Mage stuck to Cho.

Gall.name: Shadowflame
Gall.description: Deal 147 (+0.05 per level) damage to enemies in the area.

Gall.name: Dread Orb
Gall.description: Throw a bomb that will bounce three times, dealing 148 (+0.05 per level) damage to enemies.

Gall.name: Runic Blast
Gall.description: Detonate Cho's Rune Bomb, dealing 274 (+0.04 per level) damage around it.

Gall.name: Twisting Nether
Gall.description: After 1 second, nearby enemies are slowed by 50% while you channel, up to 5 seconds. Activate to deal 415 (+0.05 per level) damage.

Gall.name: Shadow Bolt Volley
Gall.description: After 1 second, unleash 19.375 Shadow Bolts over 3.875 seconds, each dealing 103 (+0.04 per level) damage to the first target hit. The bolts fire towards your mouse.

Gall.name: Two-Headed
Gall.description: Permanently attached to Cho, going where he goes. You are immune to Stun and Silence effects.

Gall.name: Hurry Up, Oaf!
Gall.description: Increases your Movement Speed by 59.52%. This effect decays over 3 seconds.

1.name: Spurred Onward
1.description: Increase the initial speed boost of Hurry Up, Oaf! to 70%. Hurry Up, Oaf! cooldown reduced by 2 seconds when hitting an enemy Hero with an Ability.

1.name: Shove
1.description: Nudge Cho a small distance in the direction you choose.

1.name: Eye of Kilrogg
1.description: Place an eye, granting vision of a large area around it for 45 seconds. The eye can be killed by enemies with 2 Basic Attacks.

4.name: Bomb's Away
4.description: Increases Cho's Rune Bomb range by 20%.

4.name: Runic Persistence
4.description: Using Runic Blast no longer destroys Rune Bomb.

4.name: Double Back
4.description: Dread Orb's third bounce instead bounces backwards.

7.name: Edge of Madness
7.description: Increases Shadowflame damage by 20% to nearby targets, and 10% to mid-range targets. Distant targets take normal damage.

7.name: Double Trouble
7.description: If Shadowflame hits an enemy Hero afflicted with Cho's Consuming Blaze, its cooldown is reduced by 1 second.

7.name: Dark Descent
7.description: Increases Runic Blast's damage by 5% every time you get a Hero Takedown, up to 20%. These bonuses are lost upon dying.

10.name: Shadow Bolt Volley
10.description: After 1 second, unleash 19.375 Shadow Bolts over 3.875 seconds, each dealing 103 (+0.04 per level) damage to the first target hit. The bolts fire towards your mouse.

10.name: Twisting Nether
10.description: After 1 second, nearby enemies are slowed by 50% while you channel, up to 5 seconds. Activate to deal 415 (+0.05 per level) damage.

13.name: Rising Dread
13.description: Dread Orb does 25% more damage on the second bounce and 75% more damage the third bounce.

13.name: Speed of Twilight
13.description: When Dread Orb hits an enemy Hero, gain 30% Movement Speed for 5 seconds.

13.name: Dread Shield
13.description: When Dread Orb hits an enemy Hero, gain a Shield absorbing 256 (+0.04 per level) damage for 5 seconds.

16.name: Twilight Nova
16.description: After the first bounce, 2 extra bombs bounce to the sides once.

16.name: Giant Scorcher
16.description: Shadowflame also does 3% of a Hero's maximum Health.

16.name: Shadowflare
16.description: Increases Shadowflame's width by 50%. Enemies hit are slowed by 25% for 1 second.

20.name: Shadowfury
20.description: Shadow Bolt Volley hits all enemies in its path.

20.name: The Nether Calls
20.description: Increases Twisting Nether's slow by 10% and damage by 10% for every second channeled, to a maximum of 40% increase.

20.name: Psychotic Break
20.description: Increases your Ability Damage by 5%. Upon dying, the cooldown on your Heroic Ability is reset and you can continue to use Abilities for 10 seconds.

name: Gazlowe
title: Boss of Ratchet
description: A Summoner that specializes in controling key areas of the battleground.

Tinker.name: Rock-It! Turret
Tinker.description: Creates a turret that deals 68 (+0.04 per level) damage. Lasts for 30 seconds. Stores 2 charges.

Tinker.name: Deth Lazor
Tinker.description: Charged attack that deals 137 (+0.04 per level) damage to enemies in a line. Damage and range increase the longer the Ability is charged, up to 100% after 3 seconds.

Tinker.name: Xplodium Charge
Tinker.description: Places a bomb that deals 233 (+0.04 per level) damage to enemies within target area after 2.5 seconds, stunning them for 1.75 seconds.

Tinker.name: Grav-O-Bomb 3000
Tinker.description: After a 2 second delay, pull enemies toward the center of an area and deal 251 (+0.04 per level) damage.

Tinker.name: Robo-Goblin
Tinker.description: Basic Attacks deal 200% bonus damage to non-Heroes. Activate to order any nearby Rock-It! Turrets to focus a target.

Tinker.name: Salvager
Tinker.description:
Destroyed enemy Structures and your Rock-it! Turrets drop Scrap. Collecting Scrap restores 30 Mana and causes your Abilities to recharge three times as fast over 3.07 seconds. 
Activate Salvager to dismantle a target Rock-it! Turret and turn it into Scrap.

1.name: Extra TNT
1.description: Increases Xplodium Charge damage by 10% per target hit, up to 100%.

1.name: Scrap-o-Matic Smelter
1.description: Increases the Mana restored from Scrap by 100%.

1.name: Break it Down!
1.description: Scrap causes Abilities to cooldown four times as fast for 3.07 seconds.

1.name: Regeneration Master
1.description: Quest: Gathering a Regeneration Globe increases your Health Regeneration by 1 per second, up to 30. Reward: After gathering 30 Regeneration Globes, you also gain 500 Health.

4.name: Clockwerk Steam Fists
4.description: Basic Attacks increase the duration of active Rock-It! Turrets by 2 seconds.

4.name: ARK Reaktor
4.description: Reduces Xplodium Charge's cooldown by 2 seconds.  If Xplodium Charge hits an enemy Hero, you gain 2 charges of Rock-It! Turret.

4.name: Reduce, Reuse, Recycle
4.description: Enemy Minions that die near you have a 15% chance to drop Scrap.

4.name: Mercenary Lord
4.description: Friendly non-Boss Mercenaries near you deal 50% more damage. Reduces damage taken from Minions and Mercenaries by 50%.

7.name: Rock-It! Turret XL
7.description: Rock-It! Turrets attack up to 2 additonal enemies for 60% (+0.0235% per level) damage.

7.name: Engine Gunk
7.description: Rock-It! Turret attacks slow enemies by 25% for 2 seconds.

7.name: Hyperfocus Coils
7.description: Deth Lazor charges twice as fast.

10.name: Robo-Goblin
10.description: Basic Attacks deal 200% bonus damage to non-Heroes. Activate to order any nearby Rock-It! Turrets to focus a target.

10.name: Grav-O-Bomb 3000
10.description: After a 2 second delay, pull enemies toward the center of an area and deal 251 (+0.04 per level) damage.

13.name: Turret Storage
13.description: Increases Rock-It! Turret maximum charges from 2 to 3.

13.name: EZ-PZ Dimensional Ripper
13.description: Deth Lazor slows Heroes by 40% and freezes non-Heroes for 3 seconds.

13.name: X-Tra Large Bombs
13.description: Increases Xplodium Charge range and radius by 30%.

13.name: Sprint
13.description: Activate to gain 75% Movement Speed for 3 seconds.

16.name: Superior Schematics
16.description: Increase Rock-It! Turrets damage by 25% when you are within their attack range.

16.name: Goblin Fusion
16.description: Deth Lazor can be charged for 1 additional second to increase its damage bonus by an additional 100%.

16.name: Kwik Release Charge
16.description: Xplodium Charge gains a second charge.

20.name: Mecha-Lord
20.description: Basic Attacks deal 200% bonus damage to Heroes.

20.name: Miniature Black Hole
20.description: Increases Grav-O-Bomb radius by 25% and damage by 50%.

20.name: Firin' Mah Lazorz
20.description: Firing Deth Lazor causes all of your Rock-It! Turrets to fire a Deth Lazor of their own that deals 137 (+0.04 per level) damage.

20.name: It's Raining Scrap
20.description: Activate to create 5 Scrap near you over 5 seconds.

name: Greymane
title: Lord of the Worgen
description: A high damage Assassin that wears down enemies from afar and dives in for the kill.

Greymane.name: Razor Swipe
Greymane.description:
Swipe towards the area in front of you for 159 (+0.04 per level) damage.
Human: Gilnean Cocktail
Damage the first enemy hit and deal heavy damage behind them.

Greymane.name: Gilnean Cocktail
Greymane.description:
Hurl a flask that deals 59 (+0.04 per level) damage to the first enemy hit and explodes for 236 (+0.04 per level) damage to enemies in a cone behind them.
Worgen: Razor Swipe
Swipe forward and damage enemies you pass through.

Greymane.name: Inner Beast
Greymane.description: Gain 50% Attack Speed for 3 seconds. Basic Attacks refresh this duration.

Greymane.name: Disengage
Greymane.description:
Roll away and shapeshift into a Human.
Human: Darkflight
Leap at an enemy and shapeshift into a Worgen.

Greymane.name: Darkflight
Greymane.description:
Shapeshift into a Worgen and leap at an enemy dealing 88 (+0.04 per level) damage.
Worgen: Disengage
Roll away and shapeshift into a Human.

Greymane.name: Go for the Throat
Greymane.description: Leap at an enemy Hero and shapeshift into a Worgen, slashing for 420 (+0.04 per level) damage. If this kills them, the Ability can be used a second time within 10 seconds for free.

Greymane.name: Marked for the Kill
Greymane.description: Shapeshift into a Human and fire a bullet that hits the first enemy Hero in its path for 68 (+0.04 per level) damage. For 5 seconds, they are Vulnerable, taking 25% more damage. Each time you deal damage to the Vulnerable Hero, the duration is refreshed.

Greymane.name: Curse of the Worgen
Greymane.description:
Use certain Abilities to shapeshift between a Human and a Worgen.
While Human, your Basic Attack is ranged.
While Worgen, your Basic Attack is melee but deals 50% (-0.0143% per level) more damage.

1.name: Wolfheart
1.description: While Inner Beast is active, each Basic Attack lowers its cooldown by 1 second.

1.name: Perfect Aim
1.description: Increases Gilnean Cocktail's range by 30.3571% and refunds 50 Mana if it hits an enemy Hero.

1.name: Scented Tincture
1.description: Gilnean Cocktail reveals enemy Heroes for 10 seconds.

1.name: Viciousness
1.description: Increases Inner Beast's duration to 4 seconds, and causes Ability damage to also refresh its duration.

4.name: Thick Skin
4.description: Using Darkflight reduces the damage taken from the next 2 Hero Basic Attacks by 50% while a Worgen.

4.name: Eyes in the Dark
4.description: Disengage grants Stealth for 4 seconds.

4.name: Insatiable
4.description: Inner Beast causes Basic Attacks to restore 10 Mana, up to 140.

4.name: Draught Overflow
4.description: Increases Gilnean Cocktail's explosion length by 35%.

7.name: Quicksilver Bullets
7.description: Increases Human Basic Attack range by 20%.

7.name: Incendiary Elixir
7.description: Quest: Every time you hit an enemy Hero with the explosion damage from Gilnean Cocktail increase its explosion damage by 10, up to 150. Reward: After hitting 15 Heroes, the cooldown is also reduced by 4 seconds.

7.name: Wizened Duelist
7.description: Quest: Hero takedowns increase Basic Attack damage by 3%, up to 30%. This bonus is lost on death.

10.name: Go for the Throat
10.description: Leap at an enemy Hero and shapeshift into a Worgen, slashing for 420 (+0.04 per level) damage. If this kills them, the Ability can be used a second time within 10 seconds for free.

10.name: Marked for the Kill
10.description: Shapeshift into a Human and fire a bullet that hits the first enemy Hero in its path for 68 (+0.04 per level) damage. For 5 seconds, they are Vulnerable, taking 25% more damage. Each time you deal damage to the Vulnerable Hero, the duration is refreshed.

13.name: Running Wild
13.description: Increases Darkflight and Disengage's range by 35%.

13.name: Visceral Attacks
13.description: Worgen Basic Attacks reduce Razor Swipe's cooldown by 1 second.

13.name: On the Prowl
13.description: Inner Beast increases your Movement Speed by 30% once it has been active for 3 seconds.

13.name: Unfettered Assault
13.description: Increases Razor Swipe's lunge distance by 60%.

16.name: Eager Wolf
16.description: Increases the Attack Speed bonus of Inner Beast by an additional 40% after it has been active for 4 seconds.

16.name: Relentless Predator
16.description: Reduces the duration of stuns, slows, roots, and polymorphs against you by 75% while in Worgen form.

16.name: Executioner
16.description: Attacking a Hero that is slowed, rooted, or stunned increases your Basic Attack damage by 30% for 3 seconds.

16.name: Alpha Killer
16.description: Worgen Basic Attacks against Heroes deal bonus damage equal to 3% of the Hero's maximum Health.

20.name: Unleashed
20.description: If the free cast of Go for the Throat kills its target, another free cast is provided that deals 25% more damage, up to 100%.

20.name: Gilnean Roulette
20.description: Marked for the Kill is now refreshed by any damage done to the Vulnerable Hero.

20.name: Hunter's Blunderbuss
20.description: Human Basic Attacks splash for 100% damage behind the target.

20.name: Tooth and Claw
20.description: Worgen Basic Attacks cleave for 100% damage.

name: Gul'dan
title: Darkness Incarnate
description: A sustained damage Mage who uses his health as fuel but can steal life from his enemies.

Guldan.name: Fel Flame
Guldan.description: Release a wave of flame, dealing 181 (+0.045 per level) damage to enemies.

Guldan.name: Drain Life
Guldan.description: Drain the life from an enemy over 3 seconds, dealing 132 (+0.16 per level) damage per second and healing Gul'dan for 172 (+0.16 per level) Health per second.

Guldan.name: Corruption
Guldan.description: Call forth three bursts of shadow energy, dealing 204 (+0.27 per level) damage over 6 seconds. Stacks 3 times.

Guldan.name: Horrify
Guldan.description: After a short delay, deal 120 (+0.04 per level) damage and fear enemy Heroes in the area for 2 seconds.

Guldan.name: Rain of Destruction
Guldan.description: Summon a rain of meteors in an area for 7 seconds. Each meteor deals 165 (+0.04 per level) damage in a small area.

Guldan.name: Life Tap
Guldan.description:
Gul'dan does not regenerate Mana.
Activate to restore 25% mana.

1.name: Pursuit of Flame
1.description: Quest: Hit 40 enemy Heroes with Fel Flame. Reward: Fel Flame's radius is increased by 10%.

1.name: Glyph of Drain Life
1.description: Increases the cast range of Drain Life by 25%.

1.name: Echoed Corruption
1.description: Quest: Hit 30 enemy Heroes with Corruption. Reward: After the third strike, Corruption strikes 3 times in the opposite direction.

1.name: Chaotic Energy
1.description: Quest: Gathering a Regen Globe causes your next Basic Ability with a Mana cost to refund 25 Mana Reward: After Gathering 20 Regen Globes your Basic Ability Mana costs are permanently reduced by 20.

4.name: Health Funnel
4.description: If an enemy dies while under the effect of Drain Life, the cooldown is reduced by 6 seconds.

4.name: Improved Life Tap
4.description: Life Tap now restores 35% Mana

4.name: Consume Soul
4.description: Instantly kill an enemy Minion and heal for 365 (+0.04 per level) Health.

7.name: Bound by Shadow
7.description: Each enemy Hero hit with Fel Flame reduces the cooldown of Corruption by 1 second.

7.name: Devour the Frail
7.description: Drain Life deals 50% more damage to enemies below 50% Health.

7.name: Curse of Exhaustion
7.description: Upon expiration, Corruption slows enemy Movement Speed by 50% for 2 seconds.

7.name: Hunger for Power
7.description: Increases Ability Power by 15% but reduces healing received from allies by 25%.

10.name: Horrify
10.description: After a short delay, deal 120 (+0.04 per level) damage and fear enemy Heroes in the area for 2 seconds.

10.name: Rain of Destruction
10.description: Summon a rain of meteors in an area for 7 seconds. Each meteor deals 165 (+0.04 per level) damage in a small area.

13.name: Fel Armor
13.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with Fel Flame grants a Spell Shield, reducing Ability Damage taken by 30.4348% for 2.5 seconds.

13.name: Harvest Life
13.description: Drain Life heals for 50% more Health when used on Heroes.

13.name: Dark Bargain
13.description: Your maximum Health is permanently increased by 25% but your Death Respawn time is increased by 15 seconds.

13.name: Healthstone
13.description: Activate to heal for 30.07% of your maximum Health.

16.name: Rampant Hellfire
16.description: Fel Flame's damage is increased by 6% for 5 seconds when hitting an enemy Hero. This can stack up to 5 times.

16.name: Ruinous Affliction
16.description: Corruption deals an additional 78 (+0.04 per level) damage on impact. If the enemy is hit by all three strikes, the third strike deals 233 (+0.04 per level) damage.

16.name: Darkness Within
16.description: After using Life Tap, the next ability you cast has 20% increased Ability Power.

20.name: Haunt
20.description: Increases the duration of Horrify by 1 second and feared enemies become Vulnerable, taking 25% increased damage.

20.name: Deep Impact
20.description: Rain of Destruction slows enemies Movement Speed by 90% for 0.5 seconds.

20.name: Demonic Circle
20.description: Summon a Demonic Circle at your location. Activate to teleport to the Demonic Circle.

name: Illidan
title: The Betrayer
description: A mobile, sustained damage Assassain who pairs well with Heroes that can enable him.

Illidan.name: Dive
Illidan.description: Dive at the target, dealing 66 (+0.04 per level) damage and flipping to the other side of the target.

Illidan.name: Sweeping Strike
Illidan.description: Dash towards target point, dealing 119 (+0.04 per level) damage to enemies along the way. Hitting an enemy increases your Basic Attack damage by 35% for 3 seconds.

Illidan.name: Evasion
Illidan.description: Evade enemy Basic Attacks for 2.5 seconds.

Illidan.name: The Hunt
Illidan.description: Charge to target unit, dealing 251 (+0.04 per level) damage on impact and stunning for 1 second.

Illidan.name: Metamorphosis
Illidan.description: Transform into Demon Form at the target location, dealing 46 (+0.04 per level) damage in the area. Temporarily increase your maximum Health by 200 (+0.04 per level) for each Hero hit. Lasts for 18 seconds.

Illidan.name: Betrayer's Thirst
Illidan.description: Basic Attacks heal for 30% of damage dealt and reduce your Ability cooldowns by 1 second.

1.name: Immolation
1.description: After using Sweeping Strike, burn nearby enemies for 22 (+0.04 per level) damage a second for 4 seconds.

1.name: Battered Assault
1.description: If you hit 2 or more Heroes with Sweeping Strike, increase its damage bonus from 35% to 125%.

1.name: Unending Hatred
