1.description: Quest: Every Minion you kill gives you 0.1 Attack Damage. Every Takedown gives 1 Attack Damage. Reward: Once you reach 20 Attack Damage, receive an additional 10 Attack damage.

4.name: Rapid Chase
4.description: Dive grants 15% Movement Speed for 2.1875 seconds.

4.name: Friend or Foe
4.description: Increases the range of Dive by 33% and allows it to be used on allied Heroes without damaging them.

4.name: Unbound
4.description: Allows Sweeping Strike to go over walls and terrain. If Sweeping Strike doesn't hit any enemies, the cooldown is reduced by 4 seconds.

7.name: Reflexive Block
7.description: Dive reduces the damage taken from the next 2 Hero Basic Attacks by 75%. Lasts 3 seconds.

7.name: Thirsting Blade
7.description: Betrayer's Thirst's healing from Basic Attacks is increased from 30% to 50% while Sweeping Strike's damage bonus is active.

7.name: Hunter's Onslaught
7.description: Basic Abilities heal for 25% of the damage they deal. Double this bonus versus Heroes.

10.name: Metamorphosis
10.description: Transform into Demon Form at the target location, dealing 46 (+0.04 per level) damage in the area. Temporarily increase your maximum Health by 200 (+0.04 per level) for each Hero hit. Lasts for 18 seconds.

10.name: The Hunt
10.description: Charge to target unit, dealing 251 (+0.04 per level) damage on impact and stunning for 1 second.

13.name: Nimble Defender
13.description: If Sweeping Strikes hits an enemy Hero you gain Resistant for 2 seconds, reducing damage taken by 25%.

13.name: Elusive Strike
13.description: Sweeping Strike reduces the cooldown of Evasion by 3 seconds every time it damages an enemy Hero.

13.name: Sixth Sense
13.description: Evasion reduces the damage you take from the next 2 Abilities by 75% while it's active.

16.name: Marked for Death
16.description: Dive deals an extra 225 damage if you hit a target consecutively within 10 seconds.

16.name: Fiery Brand
16.description: Every 4th attack against the same Hero deals an additional 6% of their maximum Health as damage.

16.name: Blades of Azzinoth
16.description: Hitting 5 Heroes with Sweeping Strike allows you to activate Blades of Azzinoth to increase your Basic Attack damage by 75% for 8 seconds.

20.name: Demonic Form
20.description: Permanently remain in Demonic Form. Metamorphosis also increases your Attack Speed by 20% and reduces the duration of disabling effects against you by 50%. You can now mount in Demonic Form.

20.name: Nowhere to Hide
20.description: The Hunt gains unlimited range. You passively reveal enemy Heroes below 25% Health anywhere on the Battleground.

20.name: Nexus Blades
20.description: Basic Attacks deal 20% more damage and slow enemy Movement Speed by 20% for 1 second.

20.name: Bolt of the Storm
20.description: Activate to teleport to a nearby location.

name: Jaina
title: Archmage
description: A frost Mage that can slow the entire enemy team.

Jaina.name: Frostbolt
Jaina.description: Deal 190 (+0.04 per level) damage and Chill the target.

Jaina.name: Blizzard
Jaina.description: Bombard an area with 3 waves of ice, dealing 142 (+0.04 per level) damage each. Damaged enemies are Chilled.

Jaina.name: Cone of Cold
Jaina.description: Deal 230 (+0.04 per level) damage and Chill targets.

Jaina.name: Summon Water Elemental
Jaina.description: Summons a Water Elemental at target location. The Water Elemental's Basic Attacks do 78 (+0.04 per level) damage, splash for 25% damage and Chill. Can reactivate the Ability to retarget the Water Elemental.  Lasts 20 seconds.

Jaina.name: Ring of Frost
Jaina.description: After a 1.5 second delay, create a Ring of Frost in an area that deals 310 (+0.04 per level) damage and roots enemies for 3 seconds. The ring persists for 3 seconds afterward, Chilling any enemies who touch it.

Jaina.name: Frostbite
Jaina.description: All abilities Chill targets, slowing Movement Speed by 25% and amplifying damage from your abilities by 50%. Lasts 4 seconds.

1.name: Winter's Reach
1.description: Increases the range of Frostbolt by 30%.

1.name: Lingering Chill
1.description: Increases the duration of Chill from 4 seconds to 6 seconds.

1.name: Deep Chill
1.description: Increases the slow of Chill from 25% to 30%.

1.name: Conjurer's Pursuit
1.description: Quest: Gathering Regeneration Globes increases your Mana Regeneration by 0.1015 per second, up to 2.5375 per second. Reward: After gathering 25 Globes, also increase your maximum Mana by 100.

4.name: Frost Shards
4.description: Frostbolt will now pierce the first target to hit an additional target behind them.

4.name: Arcane Intellect
4.description: Dealing damage to a Chilled target returns Mana to Jaina. Basic Attacks return 5 Mana and Abilities return 20.

4.name: Frost Armor
4.description: Enemy Heroes that attack you are Chilled. Additionally, every 10 seconds you reduce damage taken from the next Hero Basic Attack by 50%.

7.name: Ice Floes

7.name: Frostbitten
7.description: Increases the damage bonus of Frostbite from 50% to 65%.

10.description: After a 1.5 second delay, create a Ring of Frost in an area that deals 310 (+0.04 per level) damage and roots enemies for 3 seconds. The ring persists for 3 seconds afterward, Chilling any enemies who touch it.

10.name: Summon Water Elemental
10.description: Summons a Water Elemental at target location. The Water Elemental's Basic Attacks do 78 (+0.04 per level) damage, splash for 25% damage and Chill. Can reactivate the Ability to retarget the Water Elemental.  Lasts 20 seconds.

13.name: Storm Front
13.description: Increases the cast range of Blizzard by 100%.

13.name: Ice Barrier
13.description: When Jaina does increased damage from Frostbite, she is shielded for 25% of the total damage dealt. This Shield lasts 4 seconds.

13.name: Icy Veins
13.description: Activate to make your Basic Abilities' cooldowns recharge three times as fast and reduce their Mana cost by 50% for 5 seconds.

16.name: Snowstorm
16.description: Increases the radius of Blizzard by 30%.

16.name: Northern Exposure
16.description: Enemies damaged by Cone of Cold are also afflicted with Vulnerable, increasing the damage they take by 25% for 2 seconds.

16.name: Numbing Blast
16.description: Cone of Cold also roots Chilled targets for 1 second.

20.name: Cold Snap
20.description: The center of the ring also explodes with frost after the first ring expires.

20.name: Wintermute
20.description: Increases the cast range of Water Elemental by 50%, and the Water Elemental will now mimic your Basic Abilities for 50% damage.

20.name: Improved Ice Block
20.description: Activate to place yourself in Stasis and gain Invulnerability for 2.5 seconds. When this effect expires, nearby enemies are Chilled.

20.name: Arcane Power
20.description: Activate to instantly restore 400 Mana and increase Ability Power by 15% for 10 seconds.

name: Johanna
title: Crusader of Zakarum
description: A Tank who shines against Physical Attackers and can effectively clear groups of minions.

Crusader.name: Punish
Crusader.description: Step forward dealing 113 (+0.04 per level) damage and slowing enemies by 60% decaying over 2 seconds.

Crusader.name: Condemn
Crusader.description: After 1 second, you pull nearby enemies toward you, stunning them for 0.25 seconds and dealing 55 (+0.04 per level) damage.

Crusader.name: Shield Glare
Crusader.description: Deal 59 (+0.04 per level) damage to enemies and cause them to miss Basic Attacks for 1.5 seconds.

Crusader.name: Falling Sword
Crusader.description:
You leap towards an area.  While in the air, you can steer the landing location by moving. 
After 2 seconds you land, dealing 365 (+0.04 per level) damage to nearby enemies and knocking them into the air.

Crusader.name: Blessed Shield
Crusader.description: Deal 114 (+0.04 per level) damage and stun the first enemy hit for 1.5 seconds. Blessed Shield then bounces to 2 nearby enemies, dealing 57 (+0.04 per level) damage and stunning them for 0.75 seconds.

Crusader.name: Iron Skin
Crusader.description: Gain a Shield that absorbs 674 (+0.04 per level) damage for 4 seconds. While this Shield is active, you are Unstoppable.

1.name: Regeneration Master
1.description: Quest: Gathering a Regeneration Globe increases your Health Regeneration by 1 per second, up to 30. Reward: After gathering 30 Regeneration Globes, you also gain 500 Health.

1.name: Reinforce
1.description: Using a Basic Ability reduces damage taken from the next Hero Basic Attack by 75%.  Stores up to 2 charges.

1.name: Righteous Smash
1.description: Punish restores 10 Mana per enemy hit.

1.name: Knight Takes Pawn
1.description: Condemn deals 165 (+0.12 per level) additional damage to Minions and Mercenaries and stuns them for 3 seconds.

4.name: Amplified Healing
4.description: Increases regeneration effects and all healing received by 30%.

4.name: Roar
4.description: Increases Punish damage by 50%.

4.name: Eternal Retaliation
4.description: Condemn's cooldown is lowered by 0.75 seconds for each enemy affected. Maximum of 10 targets.

4.name: Laws of Hope
4.description:
Regenerating 10 (+0.04 per level) Health per second.
Activate to heal 20% of your max Health over 4 seconds.

7.name: Blessed Momentum
7.description: Basic Attacks reduce your Basic Ability cooldowns by 0.5 seconds.

7.name: Conviction
7.description: Movement Speed is increased by 25% while Condemn is charging up.

7.name: The Crusade Marches On
7.description: Basic and Heroic Abilities lower the cooldown of Iron Skin by 1.5 seconds.

7.name: Sins Exposed
7.description: Shield Glare marks enemies for 4 seconds. The next time any ally damages them, they take 68 (+0.04 per level) extra damage and the mark is removed.

10.name: Falling Sword
10.description:
You leap towards an area.  While in the air, you can steer the landing location by moving. 
After 2 seconds you land, dealing 365 (+0.04 per level) damage to nearby enemies and knocking them into the air.

10.name: Blessed Shield
10.description: Deal 114 (+0.04 per level) damage and stun the first enemy hit for 1.5 seconds. Blessed Shield then bounces to 2 nearby enemies, dealing 57 (+0.04 per level) damage and stunning them for 0.75 seconds.

13.name: Burning Rage
13.description: Deal 23 (+0.04 per level) damage per second to nearby enemies.

13.name: Hold Your Ground
13.description: Increases Iron Skin's Shield by 20%, and if the Shield is destroyed by damage the cooldown is reduced by 4 seconds.

13.name: Subdue
13.description: Increases Punish's slow to 80% decaying over 3 seconds.

13.name: Spell Shield
13.description: Upon taking Ability Damage, reduce that damage and further Ability Damage by 50% for 3 seconds.  Can only trigger once every 30 seconds.

16.name: Holy Renewal
16.description: Every enemy Hero affected by Shield Glare heals you for 114 (+0.04 per level).

16.name: Blessed Hammer
16.description: Condemn also creates a hammer that spirals around you, dealing 41 (+0.04 per level) damage to enemies it hits.

16.description: While Iron Skin is active, gain 8% Movement Speed each time you take damage.  Stacks up to 40%.

16.description: Heroes and Summons that attack you have their Attack Speed slowed by 40%.

20.name: Heaven's Fury
20.description: While in the air, holy bolts rain down on enemies dealing 75 (+0.04 per level) damage and reducing the cooldown of Falling Sword by 2 seconds for each enemy hit.

20.name: Radiating Faith
20.description: Increases Blessed Shield's stun duration by 33% and maximum enemies hit by 2.

20.name: Indestructible
20.description: Upon taking fatal damage, gain a Shield equal to your maximum Health for 5 seconds. This effect has a 120 second cooldown.

20.name: Storm Shield
20.description: Activate to give all nearby allied Heroes a Shield for 20% of their max Health for 3 seconds.

name: Kael'thas
title: The Sun King
description: A fire Mage that punishes enemies that stay close together.

Kaelthas.name: Flamestrike
Kaelthas.description:
After 1 second, deal 320 (+0.04 per level) damage in an area. 
Verdant Spheres increases the radius by 50%.

Kaelthas.name: Living Bomb
Kaelthas.description:
Deal 150 (+0.12 per level) damage over 3 seconds to an enemy, then they explode dealing 200 (+0.04 per level) damage to all nearby enemies.  Other Heroes damaged by this explosion are also affected by Living Bomb, though the secondary explosions cannot spread.
Verdant Spheres makes this Ability cost no Mana and have no cooldown.

Kaelthas.name: Gravity Lapse
Kaelthas.description:
Stun the first enemy hit for 1 second. 
Verdant Spheres causes Gravity Lapse to stun the first 3 enemies hit and increases the stun duration by 50%.

Kaelthas.name: Pyroblast
Kaelthas.description: After 2 seconds, cast a slow-moving fireball that deals 810 (+0.05 per level) damage to an enemy Hero and 405 (+0.05 per level) damage to enemies nearby.

Kaelthas.name: Phoenix
Kaelthas.description: Launch a Phoenix to an area, dealing 78 (+0.04 per level) damage to enemies along the way. The Phoenix persists for 7 seconds, attacking enemies for 78 (+0.04 per level) damage and splashing for 50%.

Kaelthas.name: Verdant Spheres
Kaelthas.description: Activate to make your next Basic Ability more powerful.

1.description: Quest: Every time Flamestrike damages an enemy Hero increase its damage by 5, up to 100. Lose all damage bonuses if you die. Reward: After gaining 100 Flamestrike damage, increase Flamestrike damage by an additional 100 and no longer lose any bonuses if you die.

1.description: Increases your Ability Power by 4%. Heal for 94 (+0.04 per level) Health when you activate Verdant Spheres.

1.description: Quest: Gathering a Regeneration Globe increases your maximum Mana by 15. Reward: After gathering 20 Globes, you can also activate Arcane Barrier to gain a Shield equal to 100% of your maximum Mana for 4 seconds. 45 second cooldown.

10.description: After 2 seconds, cast a slow-moving fireball that deals 810 (+0.05 per level) damage to an enemy Hero and 405 (+0.05 per level) damage to enemies nearby.

13.description: Each time Living Bomb deals periodic damage, your Basic Ability cooldowns are reduced by 1 second.

13.description: Living Bomb's explosion slows enemy Movement Speed by 30% for 2 seconds.

13.name: Fission Bomb
13.description: Increases Living Bomb's explosion radius by 20%.

16.description: Flamestrike will explode a second time 1.5 seconds later.

16.name: Sun King's Fury
16.description: Your Basic Attacks do 137 (+0.04 per level) bonus damage to enemies affected by Living Bomb.

16.name: Twin Spheres
16.description: Verdant Spheres gains a second charge.

20.name: Presence Of Mind

20.name: Master of Flames
20.description: Living Bomb's spread from explosions can now also spread Living Bomb.

20.name: Arcane Power
20.description: Activate to instantly restore 400 Mana and increase Ability Power by 15% for 10 seconds.

name: Kerrigan
title: Queen of Blades
description: A combo Assassin who goes all in, diving into the enemy team.

Kerrigan.description: Deals 82 (+0.08 per level) damage per second to nearby enemies. Lasts for 7 seconds.

Gain 10% of damage dealt from Basic Attacks and Abilities as Shields for 6 seconds. Shield amount gained doubled against Heroes.
Current maximum: 1004 (+0.04 per level)

4.description: After casting Primal Grasp, deal 48 (+0.08 per level) damage per second to nearby enemies. Lasts 5 seconds.

10.description: Summon an Ultralisk that attacks the target to deal 100 (+0.04 per level) damage. Attacks splash to nearby enemies for 50% damage. Can reactivate the Ability to retarget the Ultralisk. Lasts for 20 seconds.

13.description: Increases Ravage's range by 40%.

13.description: When your Basic Abilities damage an enemy, your next Basic Attack hits for 75% bonus damage.

13.description: Activate to increase your Movement Speed by 30% for 4 seconds. Queen's Rush is also applied for free on Takedowns.

16.description: Activate to deal 10% of target enemy Hero's Max Health and gain Assimilation Shields for twice that amount.

16.name: Overdrive
16.description: Activate to increase Ability Power by 25% and Mana costs by 40% for 5 seconds.

20.description: Maelstrom size increased by 25%. Amount of Assimilation Shields generated by Maelstrom increased by 100%.

20.name: Torrasque
20.description: The Ultralisk morphs into an egg when it dies. If the egg isn't killed within 4 seconds, a new Ultralisk is born.

20.name: Nexus Blades
20.description: Basic Attacks deal 20% more damage and slow enemy Movement Speed by 20% for 1 second.

20.name: Bolt of the Storm
20.description: Activate to teleport to a nearby location.

name: Kharazim
title: Veradani Monk
description: A flexible Healer that pairs well with Melee allies who like to dive into the enemy team.

Kharazim.description: Jump to an allied or enemy unit. Enemies are immediately hit with a Basic Attack. Stores 2 charges.

Kharazim.description: Heal nearby Heroes for 280 (+0.04 per level) and give them 10% Movement Speed for 3 seconds.

4.description: Activate to shield an allied Hero for 15% of their max Health for 5 seconds.

7.description: Breath of Heaven heals a second time 2 seconds later for 35% (+0.0093% per level).

7.description: Radiant Dashing to an enemy causes you to launch a volley of blows dealing 246 (+0.24 per level) total damage instead of a Basic Attack.

20.description: Activate to give all nearby allied Heroes a Shield for 20% of their max Health for 3 seconds.

name: Leoric
title: The Skeleton King
description: A Bruiser that deals high damage against teams with many high Health Heroes.

Leoric.name: Skeletal Swing
Leoric.description: Swing in front of you to deal 116 (+0.04 per level) damage and slow enemies by 40% for 2.5 seconds. Deals double damage to non-Heroic units.

Leoric.name: Drain Hope
Leoric.description: Grab an enemy Hero's soul, dealing up to 25% of their maximum Health as damage and healing you for up to 25% of your maximum Health while you are nearby, over 4 seconds. You are slowed by 20% while this is active.

Leoric.name: Wraith Walk
Leoric.description: Separate from your body, becoming Unstoppable and gaining Movement Speed accelerating up to 50% over 2.5 seconds. When Wraith Walk ends or is canceled, your body jumps to your wraith.

Leoric.name: Entomb
Leoric.description: Create an unpathable tomb in front of you for 4 seconds.

Leoric.name: March of the Black King
Leoric.description: Become Unstoppable and swing your mace three times, healing yourself for 7.03% of your maximum Health for each enemy Hero hit and dealing 183 (+0.04 per level) damage.

Leoric.name: Undying
Leoric.description: Become a ghost when you die, and resurrect upon reaching full Health. Your Abilities and Talents don't do damage while dead, but will still heal you for 50% of their normal amount, causing you to cheat death.

7.description: Increases the range of Skeletal Swing by 25%.

7.description: Increases the duration of Wraith Walk by 80%.

TheLostVikings.description: Activate to have each Viking deal 101 (+0.04 per level) damage to nearby enemies.

TheLostVikings.description: All Vikings gain a 110 (+0.04 per level) to 220 (+0.04 per level) point Shield, increasing in strength for each Viking alive. Lasts 4 seconds.

TheLostVikings.name: Nordic Attack Squad
TheLostVikings.description: Activate to have all Viking Basic Attacks deal bonus damage equal to 1% of a Hero's maximum Health for 5 seconds.

TheLostVikings.name: Jump!
TheLostVikings.description: Makes all Vikings Invulnerable and able to pass over enemies for 1.5 seconds.

TheLostVikings.name: Viking Bribery
TheLostVikings.description:
Enemy Minions or captured Mercenaries killed near The Lost Vikings grant you stacks of Viking Bribery. Use 40 stacks to bribe target Mercenary, instantly defeating them. Does not work on Bosses. Maximum stacks available: 200. If a camp is defeated entirely with Bribe, the camp respawns 50% faster.
Current number of Viking Bribery stacks: <d score="LostVikingsVikingBriberyStackScore"/>

TheLostVikings.name: Play Again!
TheLostVikings.description:
Summon, fully heal, and revive all Lost Vikings at target location after a Viking channels for 2 seconds. 
Only one Viking may attempt to summon at a time.

TheLostVikings.name: Longboat Raid!
TheLostVikings.description:
Hop into an Unstoppable Longboat that fires at nearby enemies for 112 (+0.08 per level) damage per second and can fire a mortar that deals 205 (+0.04 per level) damage in an area.  The boat has increased Health for each Viking inside. If the boat is destroyed by enemies, all Vikings are stunned for 1.5 seconds. Lasts 15 seconds.
Requires all surviving Vikings to be nearby.

TheLostVikings.name: Select Erik
TheLostVikings.description: Erik moves faster than the other Vikings and has increased Basic Attack range.

TheLostVikings.name: Select Olaf
TheLostVikings.description:
Olaf can charge enemies and slow their Movement Speed by 30% for 3 seconds by right-clicking on them. 8 second cooldown. 
Olaf gains increased Health Regeneration when out of combat for 4 seconds.

TheLostVikings.name: Select Baleog
TheLostVikings.description: Baleog's Basic Attacks deal 50% splash damage to enemies behind his attack target.

TheLostVikings.name: Viking Hoard
TheLostVikings.description:
Gathering a Regeneration Globe with a Viking permanently increases all their Health Regeneration by 0.5 per second.
Current Bonus: 1 Regen per second

TheLostVikings.name: Select All Vikings
TheLostVikings.description: The Lost Vikings can be controlled individually or as a group. Each Viking has particular strengths.

TheLostVikings.name: Go Go Go!
TheLostVikings.description: The Vikings gain 30% increased Movement Speed for 4 seconds.

1.name: Olaf the Stout
1.description: Every 5 seconds, reduce the damage taken from the next enemy Hero's Basic Attack against Olaf by 75%.  Stores up to 2 charges.

1.name: Spy Games
1.description: After standing still for 3 seconds, Erik gains Stealth and his Sight Radius is increased by 75%. The Stealth persists for 3 seconds after moving.

1.name: Explosive Attacks
1.description: Increases Baleog's splash damage against non-Heroes to 100%.

1.name: Viking Bribery
1.description:
Enemy Minions or captured Mercenaries killed near The Lost Vikings grant you stacks of Viking Bribery. Use 40 stacks to bribe target Mercenary, instantly defeating them. Does not work on Bosses. Maximum stacks available: 200. If a camp is defeated entirely with Bribe, the camp respawns 50% faster.
Current number of Viking Bribery stacks: <d score="LostVikingsVikingBriberyStackScore"/>

4.name: Pain Don't Hurt
4.description: Baleog's Basic Attacks and splash damage heal for 20% of the damage dealt. Healing is doubled against Heroes.

4.name: Erik the Swift
4.description: Permanently increases Erik's base Movement Speed by 10%, and as long as Erik is moving he heals 34 (+0.04 per level) Health per second.

4.name: It's a Sabotage!
4.description: Erik's Basic Attacks against Structures destroy 5 Ammo and deal 135 (+0.2 per level) damage over 10 seconds.

4.name: Mercenary Lord
4.description: Friendly non-Boss Mercenaries near you deal 50% more damage. Reduces damage taken from Minions and Mercenaries by 50%.

7.name: Baleog the Fierce
7.description: Baleog's Basic Attacks increase his Attack Speed by 8%, stacking up to 5 times. After 3 seconds of not attacking, these stacks will rapidly decay.

7.name: Spin To Win!
7.description: Activate to have each Viking deal 101 (+0.04 per level) damage to nearby enemies.

7.name: Norse Force!
7.description: All Vikings gain a 110 (+0.04 per level) to 220 (+0.04 per level) point Shield, increasing in strength for each Viking alive. Lasts 4 seconds.

10.name: Longboat Raid!
10.description:
Hop into an Unstoppable Longboat that fires at nearby enemies for 112 (+0.08 per level) damage per second and can fire a mortar that deals 205 (+0.04 per level) damage in an area.  The boat has increased Health for each Viking inside. If the boat is destroyed by enemies, all Vikings are stunned for 1.5 seconds. Lasts 15 seconds.
Requires all surviving Vikings to be nearby.

10.name: Play Again!
10.description:
Summon, fully heal, and revive all Lost Vikings at target location after a Viking channels for 2 seconds. 
Only one Viking may attempt to summon at a time.

13.name: Hunka' Burning Olaf
13.description: Olaf deals 34 (+0.04 per level) damage every second to nearby enemies.

13.name: Jump!
13.description: Makes all Vikings Invulnerable and able to pass over enemies for 1.5 seconds.

13.name: Nordic Attack Squad
13.description: Activate to have all Viking Basic Attacks deal bonus damage equal to 1% of a Hero's maximum Health for 5 seconds.

16.name: Large and In Charge
16.description: When Olaf charges enemies, they are stunned for 1 second.

16.name: Impatience Is a Virtue
16.description: Enemies damaged by a Viking's Basic Attack reduce the cooldown of all Viking Abilities by 0.25 seconds.

16.name: 64 KB Marathon
16.description: Gain an additional 40% Movement Speed when activating Go Go Go! that decays over 4 seconds.  Additionally, the Vikings will break out of Roots and Slows.

16.name: Executioner
16.description: Attacking a Hero that is slowed, rooted, or stunned increases your Basic Attack damage by 30% for 3 seconds.

20.name: Ragnarok 'n' Roll!
20.description: The Longboat can attack two targets at once and the range of its Mortar is increased by 100%.

20.name: Checkpoint Reached
20.description: 10 seconds after using Play Again!, any dead Vikings are revived and summoned again, and all are healed to full.

20.name: The Sequel!
20.description: Reduces the Lost Vikings' death timer by 50%.

20.name: Fury of the Storm
20.description: Every 5 seconds, your next Basic Attack will deal an additional 41 (+0.04 per level) damage to the target, and 105 (+0.04 per level) damage to all nearby Minions and Mercenaries.  Each Viking has their own cooldown.

name: Thrall
title: Warchief of the Horde
description: A Bruiser who can hold his own in a lane of battle.

Thrall.name: Chain Lightning
Thrall.description: Deal 178 (+0.04 per level) damage to an enemy and half that amount to 2 nearby enemies.

Thrall.name: Feral Spirit
Thrall.description: Send out a Feral Spirit that deals 153 (+0.04 per level) damage to enemies in its path. Upon hitting an enemy Hero, the wolf stops and roots that hero in place for 1 second.

Thrall.name: Windfury
Thrall.description: Increase your Movement Speed by 30% for 4 seconds. Your next 3 Basic Attacks occur 100% faster.

Thrall.name: Sundering
Thrall.description: After a short delay, sunder the earth in a long line, dealing 274 (+0.04 per level) damage and shoving enemies to the side, stunning them for 1.25 seconds.

Thrall.name: Earthquake
Thrall.description: Summon a massive Earthquake that periodically slows enemies in the area by 70%. Lasts for 10 seconds.

Thrall.name: Frostwolf Resilience
Thrall.description: Dealing damage with Abilities grants 1 stack of Frostwolf Resilience. At 5 stacks, you are instantly healed for 301 (+0.04 per level) Health.

1.name: Block
1.description: Every 5 seconds, reduce the damage taken from the next Hero Basic Attack by 75%.  Stores up to 2 charges.

1.name: Rolling Thunder
1.description: Increases Chain Lightning's range by 30% and attacking enemies recently hit by Chain Lightning restores 10 Mana.

1.name: Rabid Wolves
1.description: Damaging Heroes with Feral Spirit grants 3 stacks of Frostwolf Resilience.

1.name: Seasoned Marksman
1.description: Quest: Every Minion killed near you grants 0.2 Attack Damage, and Takedowns grant 0.5 Attack Damage, to a max of 40 damage. Reward: Upon gaining 40 bonus Attack Damage, you can also activate Seasoned Marksman to increase your Attack Speed by 30% for 3 seconds. 60 second cooldown.

4.name: Ride The Lightning
4.description: Chain Lightning can hit 2 additional enemies for 50% damage.

4.name: Spirit Journey
4.description: Feral Spirit travels 50% farther.

4.name: Mana Tide
4.description: Frostwolf Resilience also restores 15 Mana.

4.name: Envenom
4.description: Activate to poison an enemy Hero, dealing 352 (+0.44 per level) damage over 10 seconds.

7.name: Wind Shear
7.description: Reduces the cooldown of Windfury by 4 seconds.

7.name: Stone Wolves
7.description: Increases the duration of Feral Spirit's root from 1 second to 1.5 seconds.

7.name: Follow Through
7.description: After using an Ability, your next Basic Attack within 6 seconds deals 40% additional damage.

7.name: Frostwolf's Grace
7.description: Frostwolf Resilience can be activated to immediately heal you.

10.name: Sundering
10.description: After a short delay, sunder the earth in a long line, dealing 274 (+0.04 per level) damage and shoving enemies to the side, stunning them for 1.25 seconds.

10.name: Earthquake
10.description: Summon a massive Earthquake that periodically slows enemies in the area by 70%. Lasts for 10 seconds.

13.name: Restless Wolves
13.description: If Feral Spirit hits an enemy Hero, its cooldown is reduced by 50%.

13.name: Grace Of Air
13.description: Windfury attacks grant twice as many stacks of Frostwolf Resilience.

13.name: Giant Killer
13.description: Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes deal bonus damage equal to 1.5% of the Hero's maximum Health.

13.name: Spell Shield
13.description: Upon taking Ability Damage, reduce that damage and further Ability Damage by 50% for 3 seconds.  Can only trigger once every 30 seconds.

16.name: Forked Lightning
16.description: Allows Chain Lightning to hold 2 charges that can be used in quick succession.

16.name: Tempest Fury
16.description: The final strike of Windfury hits 3 times for 75% normal damage.

16.name: Ride The Wind
16.description: Increases Windfury's Movement Speed bonus from 30% to 40%. Windfury attacks increase the Movement Speed duration by 1 second.

16.name: Blood for Blood
16.description: Activate to deal 10% of target enemy Hero's Max Health and heal for twice that amount.

20.name: Worldbreaker
20.description: Sundering travels indefinitely.

20.name: Earthen Shields
20.description: You and your allies within the Earthquake area gain a Shield equal to 15% of max Health each pulse. This shield lasts 4 seconds.

20.name: Nexus Blades
20.description: Basic Attacks deal 20% more damage and slow enemy Movement Speed by 20% for 1 second.

20.name: Bolt of the Storm
20.description: Activate to teleport to a nearby location.

name: Tracer
title: Agent of Overwatch
description: A mobile Assassin who picks off straggling enemies, finishing them off.

Tracer.name: Blink
Tracer.description: Dash towards an area. Stores 3 charges.

Tracer.name: Melee
Tracer.description: Deal 254 (+0.04 per level) damage to a nearby enemy, prioritizing Heroes. Gain 5% Pulse Bomb charge when using Melee against an enemy, and 10% against Heroes.

Tracer.name: Recall
Tracer.description: Return to the position you were at 3 seconds ago, refill your ammo, and remove all negative status effects from yourself.

Tracer.name: Pulse Bomb
Tracer.description:
Fire a short range bomb that attaches to enemy units if you hit them. The bomb explodes after 2 seconds dealing 420 (+0.055 per level) damage to them and 210 (+0.055 per level) damage to other nearby enemies.
This Ability is slowly charged over time by dealing damage to enemies with Basic Attacks and Melee.

Tracer.name: Reload
Tracer.description: You can Basic Attack while moving, and after attacking 10 times you need to reload over 0.75 seconds. You can manually reload early by activating Reload.

1.name: Pulse Strike
1.description: Increases Melee's Pulse Bomb charge from 10% to 20% against Heroes.

1.name: Slipstream
1.description: Reduces Recall's cooldown by 2 seconds and increases the amount of time Recalled by 1 second.

1.name: Tracer Rounds
1.description: Your Basic Attacks reveal enemies for 4 seconds.

4.name: Parting Gift
4.description: Recall leaves behind 3 bombs that deal 240 (+0.04 per level) damage each to different targets.

4.name: Is That a Health Pack?!
4.description: Increases Regeneration Globe and Healing Fountain healing by 100%.

4.name: Untouchable
4.description: Quest: Takedowns increase your Basic Attack damage by 2%, up to 30%. These bonuses are lost on death.

7.name: Jumper
7.description: Increases Blink's charges by 1.

7.name: Bullet Time
7.description: Basic Attacks lower the cooldown of Blink by 0.1 seconds.

7.name: Spatial Echo
7.description: Using Recall grants 2 charges of Blink.

10.name: Sticky Bomb
10.description: Increases Pulse Bomb's radius by 50% and enemies hit are slowed by 60% for 3 seconds.

10.name: Quantum Spike
10.description: Pulse Bomb deals an additional 10% of the primary target's maximum Health.

10.name: Pulse Rounds
10.description: Increases Pulse Bomb's range and charge rate from Basic Attacks against Heroes by 100%.

13.name: Bullet Spray
13.description: Increases Melee's radius by 50%, and causes it to damage all enemies in range.

13.name: Ricochet
13.description: Your Basic Attacks have a 50% chance to hit another nearby enemy, prioritizing Heroes.

13.name: Leeching Rounds
13.description: Your Basic Attacks against Heroes heal you for 20% of their damage dealt.

16.name: Sleight of Hand
16.description: Reduces Reload time by 50%. This equals 20% more damage per second.

16.name: Focus Fire
16.description: If an entire ammo magazine is unloaded on an enemy, the last bullet will deal 94.5 (+0.04 per level) bonus damage.  This is equal to 35% (-0.037% per level) of the total magazine.

16.name: Locked and Loaded
16.description: Reactivate Reload within the last 50% of its cast time to increase your Basic Attack damage by 40% for that magazine.

20.name: Get Stuffed!
20.description: Reduces Melee's cooldown by 3 seconds. Hitting an enemy with Melee who is stuck with a Pulse Bomb causes the bomb to instantly explode and knocks the target away from you.

20.name: Total Recall
20.description: Recall also heals you equal to the amount of Health you lost during that time.

20.name: Composition B
20.description: If you successfully stick a Pulse Bomb to an enemy Hero, you also drop another one at their feet that deals 50% damage and explodes slightly earlier.

name: Tychus
title: Notorious Outlaw
description: An Assassin who shreads High Health enemies.

Tychus.name: Overkill
Tychus.description: Deal 645 (+0.6 per level) damage to the target and 315 (+0.6 per level) damage to nearby targets over 4 seconds. Reactivate to select a new target.  Can move and use Abilities while channeling.

Tychus.description: Lob a grenade that deals 256 (+0.04 per level) damage, knocking enemies away.

Tychus.name: Drakken Laser Drill
Tychus.description: Call down a Laser Drill to attack nearby enemies, dealing 142 (+0.08 per level) damage every second. Reactivate to assign a new target. Lasts 22 seconds.

Tychus.name: Commandeer Odin
Tychus.description: Call down an Odin to pilot. The Odin deals increased Damage, has 60% increased Basic Attack range, and uses different Abilities. Lasts 23 seconds.

Tychus.name: Minigun
Tychus.description: Activate to have your Basic Attacks against Heroes deal bonus damage equal to 2% of their maximum Health. Lasts 3 seconds.

TychusOdin.name: Annihilate
TychusOdin.description: Fire the Odin's cannons in a straight line, dealing 196 (+0.04 per level) damage to everything in the path.

TychusOdin.name: Ragnarok Missiles
TychusOdin.description: Launches a missile at each nearby enemy, dealing 141 (+0.04 per level) damage.

1.name: Shrug It Off
1.description: Run and Gun grants Resistant for 3 seconds, reducing the damage you take by 25%.

1.name: Press the Advantage
1.description: Run and Gun increases your Basic Attack range by 25% for 4 seconds.

1.name: Dash
1.description: Quest: Run and Gun increases your Movement Speed by 1% for each Regeneration Globe you gather, up to 25%. Lasts 2 seconds. Reward: Once you have gathered 25 Regeneration Globes, also increase the range of Run and Gun by 50%.

1.name: Combat Tactician
1.description: Basic Attacks reduce the cooldown of Run and Gun by 0.75 seconds.

4.name: In the Rhythm
4.description: Quest: While Minigun is active, Basic Attacks against Heroes permanently increase future Minigun durations by 0.03 seconds.

4.name: Fully Loaded
4.description: Reduce Minigun's cooldown by 33.3333%.

4.name: The Bigger They Are...
4.description: Increases Minigun damage bonus to 4% while enemy Heroes are above 40% Health, but Minigun no longer has any effect on targets below 40%.

4.name: Master Assassin
4.description: Quest: Hero Takedowns increase your Attack Speed by 1%, up to 15%. Reward: After getting 15 Takedowns, your Attack Speed is increased by an additional 10%.

7.name: Quarterback
7.description: Increases the range of Frag Grenade by 50%.

7.name: Concussion Grenade
7.description: Increases Frag Grenade's radius by 25% and the knockback distance by 100%.

7.name: Relentless Soldier
7.description: Reduces the duration of stuns, slows, and roots against your Hero by 33%.

10.name: Commandeer Odin
10.description: Call down an Odin to pilot. The Odin deals increased Damage, has 60% increased Basic Attack range, and uses different Abilities. Lasts 23 seconds.

10.name: Drakken Laser Drill
10.description: Call down a Laser Drill to attack nearby enemies, dealing 142 (+0.08 per level) damage every second. Reactivate to assign a new target. Lasts 22 seconds.

13.name: That's the Stuff!
13.description: Minigun heals you for 100% of the bonus damage it deals to Heroes.

13.name: Neosteel Coating
13.description: Activate to reduce Ability Damage taken by 50% for 3 seconds.

13.name: Spray 'n' Pray
13.description: Increases Overkill's range by 25%.

16.name: Titan Grenade
16.description: Frag Grenade deals bonus damage to Heroes equal to 5% of their maximum Health.

16.name: Lead Rain
16.description: Overkill also slows enemy movement speed by 20%.

16.name: Armor Piercing Rounds
16.description: Increases Overkill's damage to the primary target by 50%.

20.name: Big Red Button
20.description: Odin lasts 50% longer and Ragnarok Missiles also launches a Nuclear Missile.

20.name: Focusing Diodes
20.description: Increases the range of the Drakken Laser Drill by 50%.  Deals increasing damage the longer it remains on a single target, up to 100% extra damage.

20.name: Sizzlin' Attacks
20.description: Your Basic Attacks deal bonus damage to Heroes equal to 1% of their maximum Health. Stacks with Minigun.

20.name: Bob and Weave
20.description: Run and Gun and Odin's Thrusters gain 2 additional charges and reduces Run and Gun's Mana cost from 50 to 25.

name: Tyrael
title: Archangel of Justice
description: A Tank who pairs well with allies that like to dive into the enemy team.

Tyrael.name: El'Druin's Might
Tyrael.description: Deals 110 (+0.04 per level) damage to enemies within target area, slowing them by 25% for 2.5 seconds. Reactivating will teleport you to the blade and slow nearby enemies again.

Tyrael.description: Shields you for 320 (+0.04 per level) damage and nearby allies for 128 (+0.04 per level) damage for 4 seconds.

Tyrael.name: Smite
Tyrael.description: Rake target area for 144 (+0.04 per level) damage. Allies moving through the targeted area gain 25% increased Movement Speed for 2 seconds.

Tyrael.name: Judgment
Tyrael.description: After 0.75 seconds, charge an enemy Hero dealing 100 (+0.04 per level) damage and stunning them for 1.5 seconds. Nearby enemies are knocked away and take 50 (+0.04 per level) damage.

Tyrael.name: Sanctification
Tyrael.description: After 0.5 seconds create a field of holy energy that makes allied Heroes Invulnerable. Lasts 3 seconds.

Tyrael.name: Archangel's Wrath
Tyrael.description: When you die, become invulnerable and explode for 550 (+0.04 per level) damage after 3.5 seconds.

1.name: Purge Evil
1.description: Smite deals 30% more damage to Heroes.

1.name: Protection in Death
1.description: When Archangel's Wrath explodes, shield nearby allies for 50% of their max Health for 10 seconds.

1.name: Even In Death
1.description: Increases Archangel's Wrath's damage by 25%. Basic Abilities also can be used before exploding, but deal no damage.

1.name: Regeneration Master
1.description: Quest: Gathering a Regeneration Globe increases your Health Regeneration by 1 per second, up to 30. Reward: After gathering 30 Regeneration Globes, you also gain 500 Health.

4.name: Horadric Reforging
4.description: If El'druins Might hits an enemy, its cooldown is reduced by 3 seconds.

4.name: Swift Retribution
4.description: Increases Smite's Movement Speed by 10% and duration by 1 second.

4.name: Amplified Healing
4.description: Increases regeneration effects and all healing received by 30%.

4.name: Vigorous Strike
4.description: Basic Attacks heal for 25% of the damage dealt to the primary target.

7.name: Angel's Grace
7.description: After teleporting using El'Druin's Might, gain 30% Movement Speed for 3 seconds.

7.name: Reciprocate
7.description: When your shield expires, it explodes for 200 (+0.04 per level) damage to nearby enemies.

7.name: Zealotry
7.description: Increases the duration of Righteousness by 50%, and reduces its cooldown by 2 seconds.

7.name: Searing Attacks
7.description: Activate to increase Basic Attack damage by 50% for 5 seconds. Each attack costs 15 Mana.

10.name: Judgment
10.description: After 0.75 seconds, charge an enemy Hero dealing 100 (+0.04 per level) damage and stunning them for 1.5 seconds. Nearby enemies are knocked away and take 50 (+0.04 per level) damage.

10.name: Sanctification
10.description: After 0.5 seconds create a field of holy energy that makes allied Heroes Invulnerable. Lasts 3 seconds.

13.name: Burning Rage
13.description: Deal 23 (+0.04 per level) damage per second to nearby enemies.

13.name: Angelic Absorption
13.description: Enemies that attack you while shielded grant 156 (+0.12 per level) Health over 3 seconds.

13.name: Imposing Will
13.description: Enemies that attack you while shielded have their Attack Speed and Movement Speed slowed by 50% for 2 seconds.

13.name: Angelic Might
13.description: Gain 80% increased damage on your next Basic Attack for each Hero hit by Smite.

16.name: Blade of Justice
16.description: After teleporting using El'Druin's Might, increase your Attack Speed by 50% for 5 seconds.

16.name: Holy Ground
16.description: Create a ring that blocks enemies from entering the area teleported to using El'Druin's Might.

16.name: Salvation
16.description: Each allied Hero that is affected by Righteousness increases Tyrael's Shield amount by 35%.

16.name: Blood for Blood
16.description: Activate to deal 10% of target enemy Hero's Max Health and heal for twice that amount.

20.name: Angel of Justice
20.description: Increases the cast range of Judgment by 50%, and reduces the cooldown by 40 seconds.

20.name: Holy Arena
20.description: Increases duration of Sanctification by 1 second and increases the damage of allies by 25%.

20.name: Hardened Shield
20.description: Activate to reduce damage taken by 75% for 4 seconds.

20.name: Nexus Blades
20.description: Basic Attacks deal 20% more damage and slow enemy Movement Speed by 20% for 1 second.

name: Tyrande
title: High Priestess of Elune
description: A Support who helps her allies lockdown and finish off enemies.

Tyrande.description: Heal yourself for 160 (+0.04 per level).  If cast on an ally, also heals them for 320 (+0.04 per level) Health.

Tyrande.name: Sentinel

Tyrande.name: Lunar Flare
Tyrande.description: After a short delay, deal 205 (+0.04 per level) damage and stun enemies in the target area for 0.75 seconds.

Tyrande.name: Shadowstalk
Tyrande.description: Stealth all allied Heroes and heal them for 240 (+0.64 per level) over 8 seconds.  At the conclusion of Shadowstalk, they receive a burst of 95 (+0.04 per level) healing.

Tyrande.name: Starfall
Tyrande.description: Deal 91 (+0.04 per level) damage per second and slow enemies by 20% in an area. Lasts 8 seconds.

Tyrande.name: Hunter's Mark

1.description: Reduce the Mana cost of Light of Elune by 15.

1.name: Ranger's Mark
1.description: Lower the Cooldown of Hunter's Mark by 6 seconds.

1.name: Seasoned Marksman

1.name: Empower
1.description: When Sentinel impacts, your cooldowns are instantly reduced by 2 seconds.

4.name: Pierce
4.description: Sentinel no longer stops at the first Hero hit, affecting all enemy Heroes along the path.

4.name: Focused Attack
4.description: Every 10 seconds, your next Basic Attack against a Hero deals 60% additional damage. Basic Attacks reduce this cooldown by 1 second.

4.name: Protective Shield
4.description: Activate to shield an allied Hero for 15% of their max Health for 5 seconds.

4.name: Healing Ward
4.description: Activate to place a ward on the ground that heals allies in an area for 1.95% of their maximum Health every second for 10 seconds.

4.name: Searing Arrows
4.description: Activate to increase Basic Attack damage by 50% for 5 seconds.  Each attack costs 10 Mana.

7.name: Quickening Blessing
7.description: If cast on an ally, Light of Elune also increases their Movement Speed by 25% for 3 seconds.

7.name: Lunar Blaze
7.description: Increases the range of Lunar Flare by 40%.

7.name: Lunar Momentum
7.description: Basic Attacks reduce your Basic Ability cooldowns by 0.6 seconds.

7.name: Calldown: MULE
7.description: Activate to calldown a Mule that repairs Structures, one at a time, near target point for 40 seconds, healing for 100 Health every 1 second.  Grants 1 ammo every  3 seconds.

10.name: Shadowstalk
10.description: Stealth all allied Heroes and heal them for 240 (+0.64 per level) over 8 seconds.  At the conclusion of Shadowstalk, they receive a burst of 95 (+0.04 per level) healing.

10.name: Starfall
10.description: Deal 91 (+0.04 per level) damage per second and slow enemies by 20% in an area. Lasts 8 seconds.

13.name: Overflowing Light
13.description: When you are above 50% Health, Light of Elune's allied heal is increased by 30%.

13.name: Huntress' Fury
13.description: Gain 40% additional Attack Speed for 4 seconds when using Hunter's Mark.

13.name: Sprint
13.description: Activate to gain 75% Movement Speed for 3 seconds.

13.name: Shrink Ray
13.description: Activate to reduce an enemy Hero's damage by 50% and Movement Speed by 50% for 4 seconds.

16.name: Trueshot Aura
16.description: You passively grant 15% Basic Attack damage to nearby allied Heroes.

16.name: Mark of Mending
16.description: Basic Attacks against Marked targets heal for 2.5% maximum Health.

16.name: Ranger
16.description: Increases width of Sentinel by 100%. Increases damage dealt based on distance traveled, up to a maximum of +200% damage.

16.name: Shooting Star
16.description: Lunar Flare does 50% more damage. Hitting an enemy Hero will also refund the Mana cost.

20.name: Hunter's Swiftness
20.description: When using Shadowstalk, you and allied Heroes gain 30% Movement Speed for 8 seconds.

20.description: Starfall can be cast globally.  Damage is increased by 30%.

name: Uther
title: The Lightbringer
description: A Healer that can negate high bursts of damage.

Uther.name: Holy Light
Uther.description: Heal an ally for 427 (+0.04 per level) Health.

Uther.name: Holy Radiance
Uther.description: Heal all allies in a line for 219 (+0.04 per level) Health, dealing 160 (+0.04 per level) damage to enemies.

Uther.name: Hammer of Justice
Uther.description: Deal 114 (+0.04 per level) damage and stun the target for 0.75 seconds.

Uther.description: Make an allied Hero Invulnerable and increase their Movement Speed by 20% for 3 seconds.

Uther.name: Divine Storm
Uther.description: Deal 187 (+0.04 per level) damage and stun nearby enemies for 1.75 seconds.

Uther.name: Eternal Devotion
Uther.description: Upon dying, become an Invulnerable spirit for up to 8 seconds. While in spirit form, you can heal allies with Flash of Light.

UtherSpirit.description: Heal an ally for 242 (+0.04 per level) Health.

1.description: Quest: Gathering Regeneration Globes increases your Mana Regeneration by 0.1015 per second, up to 2.5375 per second. Reward: After gathering 25 Globes, also increase your maximum Mana by 100.

1.description: Basic Attacks also restore 8 Mana.

1.description: Basic Attacks reduce cooldown of Hammer of Justice by 1 second.

1.description: Each Hero healed by Holy Radiance returns 8 Mana and reduces the cooldown by 1 second, up to a maximum of 40 Mana and 5 seconds.

4.description: You heal yourself for 30% of all healing done to allied Heroes.

7.description: After Hammer of Justice's stun fades, the enemy's Movement Speed is slowed by 30% for 2 seconds.

13.name: Shrink Ray
13.description: Activate to reduce an enemy Hero's damage by 50% and Movement Speed by 50% for 4 seconds.

16.description: Each Hero that Holy Radiance passes through increases the healing and damage of your next Holy Radiance by 8%, to a maximum of 80% increase.

16.description: While above 80% life, your Basic Ability cooldowns regenerate 50% faster.

16.name: Benediction
16.description: Activate to reduce the Mana cost of your next Basic Ability by 50 and its cooldown by 10 seconds.

20.description: Divine Shield lasts 2 seconds longer and its cooldown is reduced by 20 seconds.

20.name: Divine Hurricane
20.description: Divine Storm's radius is increased by 50% and its cooldown is reduced by 20 seconds.

20.name: Redemption
20.description: After Eternal Devotion ends, return to 50% of your maximum Health at your spirit's location. This effect has a 180 second cooldown.

20.name: Storm Shield
20.description: Activate to give all nearby allied Heroes a Shield for 20% of their max Health for 3 seconds.

name: Valeera
title: Shadow of the Uncrowned
description: A stealthed Assassin who specializes in shutting down her opponents.

name: Valla
title: Demon Hunter
description: A well-rounded Assassin that's mobile and can deal high sustaind damage.

DemonHunter.description: Deal 148 (+0.04 per level) damage to enemies within the target area.

DemonHunter.description: Rapidly attack nearby visible enemies for 68 (+0.04 per level) damage per hit, prioritizing heroes over minions. Valla is able to move and use Vault while strafing. Lasts for 4 seconds.

DemonHunter.description: Launch 2 waves of Shadow Beasts that deal 350 (+0.04 per level) damage to enemies within the target area, stunning for 0.5 seconds per wave.

DemonHunter.description: Basic Attacks grant a stack of Hatred, up to 10. Each Hatred stack increases Basic Attack damage by 3% and Movement Speed by 1%.

name: Varian
title: High King of the Alliance
description: A Multi-Class Hero that can Tank for his team or become a high damage Assassin.

name: Xul
title: Cryptic Necromancer

name: Zagara
title: Broodmother of the Swarm
description: A Summoner who provides lots of vision of the battleground.

Passive: Creep spreads 25% farther.

Summon a Nydus Worm on Creep anywhere that Zagara has vision of. Zagara can enter a Nydus Worm and travel to any other Nydus Worm by right-clicking near it. While inside a Nydus Worm, Zagara regenerates 9.75% Health and Mana per second.
Stores 2 charges. Maximum of 10 Nydus Worms at a time.

Usable on Unstoppable enemies.
